summary: Minesweeper.io - Multiplayer Minesweeper! Sweep those mines!

name: Minecraft: The Incredibles
summary: Step into the boots of the Incredibles and dive mask first into a Supers playground! Suit up and play together as Mr. & Mrs. Incredible, Frozone, Violet & Dash to save Municiberg with their incredible powers. Explore the city, bring down the Omnidroid, battle The Underminer and stop Screenslaver's hypnotic schemes. Defeat them all to make Supers legal again!

name: Milkshake!
summary: Milkshake! - a clicker with a lot of beautiful girls! You must collect all the girls, for this you need to bring them to the peak with your clicks! Each girl is animated, voiced and emotional!

name: Minna de Kuuki Yomi Koro-koro Comic Ver.
Minesweeper X
summary: Minesweeper X is a new redefined experience based on the classic video game Minesweeper. A thrilling game where you are always at the edge of your seat.

name: Mini Market Design
summary: Build your dream market and welcome your customers!

name: Milk Girl: Sweet Memories of Summer
summary: Adventure game of living together with a girl with mother milk in summer. You can move a pedestrian, talk to a girl, researching, earn money. Enjoy living together!

name: MilvusX
summary: Beautiful 3D Arcade with various levels and a developed system of complexity.

name: Mike and the Zombies
summary: The gas runned out and you're in the middle of nowhere! Now it's time to kick, shoot, fire and rip apart zombies and monsters in this 80's thriller platform game.

name: Mindtrap
summary: Puzzle game sort of combining a rubik's cube with a slide puzzle in 2D (later also 3D). You get a limited amount of time and moves to align all dice by color and to complete each screen (floor).

name: Mines
summary: Open all cells without mines!

name: Milestone Shooting Collection 2
summary: Milestone Shooting Collection 2 has everything a shooter wants. It contains: Radirgy, Radirgy Noa, Chaos Field, Karous and Ilvero, almost all of the remarkable titles the studio has created. Each of them feature a unique world full of bullets and captivating systems. Ilbero takes place in a net game sort of world and your shooting craft takes care of attack, defense and the bash-on action. Radirgy takes place in a hip electronic world and Radirgy Noa has a double player mode, so ask a friend to join your game. Chaos Field pits you against bosses the moment you enter the game, but Karous gives you a smoother learning curve, so beginners can start here before heading off to the more challenging games.

name: Midnight Club: Los Angeles - South Central
summary: South Central Premium Upgrade is the total South Central experience for Midnight Club Los Angeles delivering 9 new vehicles, 26 new races, 12 new battle maps, 10 new delivery missions, over 100 new red light races, new vinyl packs, new parts, new music, and the free South Central Map Expansion which expands the massive city of Midnight Club: Los Angeles by one third, adding four neighborhoods that make up the iconic district of South Central.

name: Milk Seller
summary:
Super Fun!
Super Fun!
Super Fun!

name: Mini Golf MatchUp
summary: Come play the game that Tiger Woods may or may not use while training for his tournaments, and find out what mini golf fun is all about!

name: Miracle Warrior of Mountains and Seas
summary: This is a through the martial arts style game, the protagonist is in a heart of justice of the youth, in the modern times he and his classmates and friends suffer from bullying, in an accident fell into the ancient well, inadvertently opened the door of time and space, through to the ancient...

name: Mimic Alert
summary: You are on a service to detect and destroy mimics - creatures capable of taking the form of any object. Your task is to carefully inspect your surroundings, use all your attentiveness and various tools to detect mimics.

name: Mikuri Sacrament
summary:
“At the end of the world, a girl leaves behind her femininity and locks her heart in ice."

A story of Mikuri's past and her meeting with Megi and Angelica from her point of view.

A fandisc for The Cradle of Ruin.

name: Mirror, Mirror
summary:
Emily can’t wait to spend the first night in her recently purchased home, but it may not be as comforting as she hoped. This house still has an occupant, and they’re particularly smitten with the new owner.

Will Emily escape the evil that inhabits her seemingly peaceful new home, or will she get pulled into the darkness?

name: Millennial Simulator
summary: Its called Millennial Simulator. Pretty self explanatory. Work, earn cash, pay rent, upgrade, eat, sleep, explore. Repeat and suffer.

name: Misremembered Memories
summary: A retro styled Len'en fangame inspired by the Japanese PC-98 Touhou Project games. Enjoy a nostalgic shoot-'em-up experience with faithful graphics and music without the hang-ups of outdated hardware.

name: Micromanagement
summary: You're bacteria. Luckily, you have psychic powers! Control your mutation to overwhelm and conquer. Gain amazing abilities for both tactical and strategic advantage. You'll need them all because this microcosmic world has a new threat...

name: Mission Evilguy
summary: Mission Evilguy is a puzzle game where you make things happen at the right time at the right place. Using your quantum wristwatch that allows you to control time, you'll have to make each level work like clockwork to reach the exit.

name: Minus 48 Degrees
summary: A puzzle game from mocomoco.

name: Mister Gas
summary: Mister Gas is a single player action/reflex video game for Amstrad CPC, created and published by Xortrapa Soft in 1990.

name: Microdoctor
summary:
Microdoctor: fight bacteria, heal the patient 
 
CONTROLS: [w,a,s,d] to move [lmb] to fire [rmb] to zoom [r] to reload [shift] to teleport [q,e] to lean 
 
game by Jan Willem Nijman & Kitty Calis music & sfx by Eirik Suhrke & Aaron Munson

name: Midnight Custody
summary: Midnight Custody is a short found-footage-style game where you wander through an eerie parking garage. It's a freaky, immersive terror fest that'll keep you on the edge of your seat!

name: Minit Man
summary: You protect the launch computer which controls your missiles from destruction from invading aliens while repairing an imperitive bridge.

name: Minna de Jibun no Setsumeisho: B-Kata, A-Kata, AB-Kata, O-Kata
Minerest
summary: Tower defence survival

name: Mischance
summary: Mischance is a game about surviving as long as possible with a curse that guarantees an imminent death. Everything in your day-to-day life is now much more likely to kill you. Your objective is to make smart choices and hope that the most simplest of activities don't end up taking your life.

name: MineClicker
summary: Mine Clicker is a clicker in Minecraft world! Tap to kill mobs and blocks. Earn xp and blocks to buy tools upgrades and hire new friends. Can you slave the Enderdragon?

name: Midnight Runner: Blade Galaxy Beat Puzzle Legacy 3D Games Ultimate Edition
summary: Midnight Runner is a fast-paced 3D platformer where you'll use your parkour skills and your reactions to climb walls and move along them, overcoming difficult areas and traps.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Convair F-106 Delta Dart
summary: Convair's superb F-106 Delta Dart is regarded by those close to it as the best all-weather interceptor ever designed. It was created as an outgrowth of the USAF's interceptor program in 1954. The aircraft used a delta wing design, common at the time because of its immunity to many of the problems experienced by conventional wings at...

name: Mission: Rift Seeker
summary: Mission: Rift seeker is a colony simulation game about building and managing your base on an unknown planet and exploring the surrounding void rifts that are full of horrific and mysterious entities that you are tasked to capture before they to eat the brave and fluffy seekers that you command.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Grumman F4F Wildcat & Martlet
summary: Developed by Just Flight, the Wildcat and Martlet add-on for FSX: Steam Edition contains four different aircraft - the Grumman F4F-3 and F4F-4 Wildcats and also the Martlet I and Martlet IV, the British name given to the F4F-3 and F4F-4-based aircraft which were supplied to Britain from the earliest days of WWII.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: Rhode Island
summary: Night Environment: Rhode Island for FSX: Steam Edition revolutionizes your VFR night flying experience. Using a series of databases, this add-on implements authentic and immersive lighting to different road types and other areas.

name: Milfvania Ep. 1
summary: An animated adult visual novel, set up in a post-soviet environment. Yes, you live with the landlady.

name: Milky Way: Galaxy Adventure
summary: A casual touch control shooting game. Build constellations, collect outfits, and enjoy the story!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - F-105D Thunderchief
summary: The Republic F-105 Thunderchief, first flown in 1955 and often known as "Thud" by its pilots, was a rugged and reliable multi-role fighter with an emphasis on low-altitude, high-speed penetration strikes with a single nuclear bomb.

name: Minna no Conveni
summary: A convenience store simulation game.

name: Miro
summary: Explore vibrant worlds while uncovering the mysteries of your origin. Overcome the dangers that await you in the vast unknown fields of unexplored planets. The truth reveals itself to those who seek, but remember that your destiny depends solely on you.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - WWI Fighters
summary: Described as World War I, The First War, The Great War and The War to End All Wars, the years 1914 to 1918 witnessed a global military conflict on a scale unthinkable just thirty years earlier. The action took place primarily in Europe but conflict soon broke out in the Middle East, Africa and the Asia Pacific Rim.

name: Minimal
summary: Unique logic game with simple controls and addictive gameplay. There is no story, no clutter - everything is simple, minimalistic. Whole game tries to keep you focused on one simple goal, which is solving current puzzle.

name: MicroGo
summary: MicroGo was an early computer rendition of the Japanese game of Go.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-32 Saratoga II TC
summary: Experience stunning visuals to complement the realism and accuracy that you have come to expect from the General Aviation aircraft experts at Alabeo.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment: California
summary: Night Environment completely revolutionizes night flying in the FSX: Steam Edition world. Using a series of databases, Night Environment adds brilliant, realistic lighting to your simulator. Hundreds of thousands of lights clearly show how highways connect to cities and how smaller roads meander through neighbourhoods.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna 182 Skylane RG II
summary: The Cessna 182 Skylane is an American four-seat, single-engined light airplane, built by Cessna. First brought to market in 1956 as a tricycle gear variant of the 180, one year later the Cessna 182A was introduced, the first to carry the Skylane name.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C195 Businessliner
summary: The C195 Businessliner is a light aircraft powered by a single radial engine. Manufactured between 1947 and 1954, 1,180 aircraft were built for private customers as well as for the US Air Force and Army.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper J-3 Cub
summary: Few aircraft define ‘stick and rudder’ flying more faithfully and distinctly than the Piper Cub. Aeroncas, Taylorcrafts, Stinsons, Luscombes and Cessnas are but refinements and alternatives to this flying legend.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Convair R3Y Tradewind
summary: In August 1946, Convair was awarded the contract to build the XP5Y-1 maritime patrol aircraft as a replacement for the troublesome PB4Y Coronado and outdated Martin Mars. Convair had ample seaplane experience with the Catalina and Coronado, as well as access to the development data from the German BV-222 'Wiking'.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Mega Airport Berlin Brandenburg
summary: Mega Airport Berlin-Brandenburg by Aerosoft covers the existing Airport Berlin Schönefeld as well as the adjacent new international airport and has an extremely impressive feature list.

name: Mission Twentynine
summary: You've got weapons, you've got enemies, you've got an arena. You'll figure out the rest.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Southern Africa
summary: Toposim South Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Southern African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Twentynine Palms Airport
summary: Twentynine Palms Airport for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition features a wealth of detail, including animated people and numerous custom scenery models exclusively designed for this scenery. The pack also includes a configuration tool allowing users to optimize the scenery for their own system requirements. Covering over 250km² with high resolution satellite imagery, Twentynine Palms provides a large environment to explore.

name: Minigun vs. Swarms of the Zombie Apocalypse Simulator
summary: 10k+ zombies on the same screen, faced with the scene of the doomsday, the raging tide of corpses, your Minigun is thirsty, yes! Hold on for 5 minutes if you think you are tough!

name: Mighty Beanz
summary: They’re the sprites living quietly in the valleys. They’re also the fearless warriors fighting the invaders with their lives. They’re on an adventurous journey to rescue the 5 Elders and to take back their land. They are the Mighty Beanz…

name: Mini Puzzle Balls
summary: Mini Puzzle Balls is a new addictive puzzle game. Move the balls into their corresponding slots. It's simple. Or is it? Look for solutions, unlock new mechanics, increase your score, and have fun.

name: Micro Machines
summary: Game Boy port of Micro Machines.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Airbus Series Vol.1
summary: FeelThere’s Airbus Series Vol. 1 is a detailed depiction of the fascinating world of Fly-By-Wire technology as well as the Airbus’ high-end systems. Developed by highly qualified programmers and with the help of active professional pilots, this add-on is the perfect entry into the universe of airliners.

name: Miner of Minerals
summary: In the exciting game "Miner of minerals" you play as a miner and your task is to dig up as many gems as possible to earn a lot of money. Upgrade your equipment and try to set a record for mining minerals every time!

name: Missing In Action
summary: Having been shown several years ago at classic gaming events, the Atari 7800 prototype Missing in Action has finally seen the light of day! AtariAge user Mitch recently acquired the only known prototype of this game to exist and has graciously shared the binary with the community so everyone may enjoy it. Missing in Action is based on the 1984 movie of the same name, featuring Chuck Norris as the protagonist. The game is a side-scrolling beat 'em up, taking place in Vietnam during the height of the Vietnam War. As Colonel James Braddock, a captured POW, your mission is to escape from an internment camp, rescue captured POWs, free the American embassy, and kill the evil drug czar. Had it been completed, Missing in Action would have been an impressive addition to the 7800 library. As it stands, this prototype is about 85% complete and is quite playable.

name: Mining Rail 2
summary:
Mining Rail 2 is a roller coaster game. 
 
Get into your mine cart and drive at high speed along the railway track, getting through the mine to the exit and down to the valley. The track is steep, the curves tight and the force tries to take your vehicle out of the bend. A good pilot now shifts the weight, tilts the mine cart in the curve and manages every tricky part of the track.

name: Michael Gower's Zombie Hill
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Krysis as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Mini Blaster
summary:
Mini Blaster is an arcade shooter with minimal graphics.
Raise the level and get upgrade, strengthen your ship and defeat the approaching enemies.

name: Mini Moni Shougakkou he Ikun da Pyon!
Miageta Sora ni Ochiteiku
summary: A visual novel developed by Applique.

name: Mini Wars Blackout
summary: Mini soldiers in epic battles! Survive the attack of countless enemies in amazing and visually impressive battle arenas, using lots of weapons, explosives and special powers.

name: Mini Tennis
summary: Pick your racket and choose your ball. Get ready to go onto the court in this brand-new tennis game! Experience tennis like never before in this fresh and easy-to-play game. In Mini Tennis, you can enjoy a casual gameplay experience that still remains loyal to the original game. It’s time for you to get a standing ovation from the crowd in the arenas and courts, score some amazing points, and build the strongest tennis legend that ever existed!

name: Mission R.I.S.K.
summary:
Mission R.I.S.K. is a cybersecurity educational game.

Earth's citizens have launched a mission to collect eco-friendly energy from a far away planet. A crew of space explorers travels aboard the S.S. Fossil. As their second-in-command, you must keep the ship safe from potential and active risks.

During gameplay, users will learn risk assessment and task assignment principles. Your actions affect the outcome of the story and the safety of your crew.

name: MiniMow
summary:
Master the simple Mow controls to reach the end, using your dexterity and reflexes. Beautiful graphics and excellent music will accompany you on your trip with MOW.
Complete the circuits touring beautiful cities, sunny beaches and inscrutable mountains.

name: MicroMachines
summary: In this 3D remake of the original miniature racing game, players can compete on 24 different race tracks with 48 vehicles including toy cars, motorcycles, boats and more, using one of 8 difference characters. As in the original, four vehicles are on track at a time.

name: Minna no Radio Controlled GP
summary: Introducing a radio-controlled game that you can enjoy with easy operation! Let's share Joy-Cons and get excited with up to 6 people!

name: Mindstone
summary: An icon/keyword driven RPG in which the player controls four main characters in search of evil Nemesar and the Mindstone he has stolen.

name: Midnight GT: Primary Racer
summary: Take control of the streets of Japan in Midnight GT: Primary Racer. Race along country back roads or tight city streets and work your way up in the world. The only way to new places is to win!

name: Milles, Knight of Anal Tyranny
summary: An erotic visual novel following the story of a girl waking up in a forest with no memories. Shortly after she makes friends and learns about the religious system of the nation she's in before trying to find a way to escape.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Deluxe
Microbes
summary: Kill the microbes to survive!

name: Mike Tyson Boxing
summary: Mike Tyson Boxing was developed by Virtucraft and published by Ubi Soft for Game Boy Advance in 2002.

name: Minecraft: Stampy's Lovely World
summary:
The official map of Stampy’s Lovely World. A place that was built over ten years and has been seen by millions.
Explore the town, play in the funland and experience the places where countless stories have been told.

• Includes 100+ attractions in Stampy’s Funland!
• Visit the town and discover its many shops and activities!
• Explore locations where memories were made!

name: Micro TD
summary: Micro TD is a tower defense game created for the Arduboy.

name: Minecraft: Tetris
summary: Dig into the strategic world of the Tetris DLC for Minecraft, where classic 2D Tetris meets the blocky adventures of dungeon crawling! Make your way through the matrix dungeons, battling colorful Tetrimonsters and unearthing pixelated secrets. With two different gameplay modes, iconic character customizations, this is Tetris like you’ve never known it before!

name: Miko No Kanata: Curious Tales from the Shrine -Rin no Shou-
summary: A visual novel from Fan-na.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator
summary: The Macintosh version featured pull-down menus and multiple view windows for the cockpit, spot plane, map, and control tower.

name: MiniTurn
summary: Miniturn is a special turn-based 1v1 multiplayer card game. The matches are played on randomly-generated maps.Your money is your health.

name: Mission Idle
summary: Mission Idle is an idle game where your main focus is to grind for levels gold and other riches that will allow you to move further in the zone stages. Mission Idle is played by being AFK. Most of the mechanics in the game are automated.

name: Mickey Mouse: Date Dash
summary: Mickey is late again! Help him find his way through all the obstacles and get to his date with Minnie in time.

name: Micro Car Crash Online Le Go!
summary: You are given complete freedom of action on an absolutely destructible toy car! Perform insane stunts on ramps and jumps! Take part in crazy car battles!

name: Miner 2049er
summary: Based on the computer game Miner 2049er. It was released in 1983.

name: Mike Ditka Power Football
summary: Mike Ditka Power Football is an American football game for the Sega Mega Drive. It was released without a license from Sega.

name: Mindseeker
summary: Mindseeker is an Adventure game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1989.

name: Mixtape
summary: Mixtape is an English Yume Nikki fangame created by GumshoeJump. The game was made for Dream Diary Jam 2 in RPG Maker 2003.

name: Miserere
summary:
In Miserere you explore the dreams of a lonely space station occupant. The unnamed occupant have been on this station for years, all alone. Needless to say, this has taken its toll on our poor protagonists mind. This occasionally shows in the dreams.
But there are still glimmers of hope.

name: Mist Guard
summary: Mist Guard is an Action RPG where you have to escape a dark, mysterious prison. Explore, fight enemies and upgrade your character to escape.

name: Might is Right
summary: Might is Right is an old-school turn-based strategy game, it has simple controls and deep complex mechanics.

name: Mind Games Entertainment Pack for Windows
summary: Mind Games Entertainment Pack For Windows contains ten classic games for Windows, including Chess, Chinese Chess, Bridge, Backgammon, Reversi, 4 In A Line, Checkers, Go, Gomuku, and Renju. Each can be run directly off the CD, or the pack can be installed to the hard drive. In general, games are played only against the computer, on one of four difficulty levels, with the option of setting up a specific scenario, changing some rules, and an undo ability.

name: Mirror Beauty
summary: "Mirror Beauty" is a casual game for beautiful girls developed in match-3 battles, where players will play the role of heroes to rescue the beautiful girls trapped by the shackles of the mirror.

name: Midnight Pool 3
summary: While you’re in Las Vegas on business, your uncle asks you for a simple favor. Before you know it, your boss’s car is stolen and your world turns upside down. Follow a trail of clues and bizarre personalities through dark pool halls, bustling bars, flashy casinos, and more, all in the hopes of tracking down the missing car and becoming the best pool player in Sin City.

name: Mixing Suns
summary: Mix Drinks. Meet People. Across Dimensions.

name: Mighty No.(9)
summary: Well to celebrate Cirno day and for the ⑨Jam, i made this small little game about cirno.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Ultimate VFR Guam
summary: Ultimate VFR Guam is designed to be the ultimate in high detail photo scenery for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition. Fly to the exotic island territory of Guam in Micronesia, located in the Northern Marianas Islands in the Western Pacific Ocean, located 1,500 miles (2,500km) south of Japan and east of the Philippines, and 4,000 miles west of Hawaii.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - REX 4 Texture Direct Enhanced Edition
summary: REX 4 Texture Direct Enhanced Edition is the latest version of the acclaimed Texture Direct series for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition.

name: Missing Parts Side B: The Tantei Stories
summary: A PlayStation 2 compilation of the second and third "Missing Parts" games, previously released on Dreamcast.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft Duchess 76
summary: The Beechcraft Duchess 76 is a popular twin engine General Aviation training and touring aircraft around the world. This model for FSX: Steam Edition comes with an authentic avionics suite, a realistic set of liveries, and is based on detailed research on the actual real-world aircraft featured in the software.

name: Missileman Spy Strike 2
summary: Venture aggressively or stealthily!

name: Mind-Blowing Girls 2
summary: A puzzle game where you need to assemble a complete image from several pieces.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Deluxe Edition
summary: Flight Simulator X will awe flight simulator fans and real pilots alike. All-new eye-popping graphics, actual missions to accomplish and a wider range of airports to visit recreate the experience of being a pilot, right down to the smallest detail. Complete point-to-point objectives and skill-based tests, or just fly around the world if you'd prefer that to ferrying passengers or cargo. Whatever you choose to do as a pilot, it's available here in Flight Simulator X Deluxe.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Bell 47
summary: Developed by FlySimWare, the Bell 47 add-on for FSX: Steam Edition includes both the Bell 47D and 47G and comes with 3 paint schemes and 5 unique models. These models include the helicopter being equipped with no equipment, floats, skids, crop dusting equipment and a MASH set up.

name: Mirrored Pawns
summary: Mirrored Pawns is a relaxing puzzle game that will challenge your spatial reasoning. Your goal is to successfully navigate 2 pawns across a chess-like board to the goal positions by working with the axes of symmetry provided to you.

name: Mike Dies
summary: Mike Dies is a challenging fast-paced exploration-platformer with dynamic brutal fatalities and a massive non-linear environment. After flying his spaceship into an asteroid field, Mike finds himself fighting for survival against hostile aliens, a ruthless kingpin and his own personal demons.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - ERCO Ercoupe 415C
summary: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition version of the Ercoupe 415C does its real world counterpart proud, accurately replicating the aircraft’s performance specifications in-sim. Complete with custom sounds, this is absolutely a must-have for light sport aviation enthusiasts!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - World Environment 2012
summary: World Environment 2012 is a weather texture enhancement package, which brings a new level of visual realism to Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition. This pack features over 250 new textures that significantly enhance the visual environment, no matter where and when you fly - adverse weather conditions become more visually intense and sunny skies more cheerful with World Environment 2012.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Hawker Hunter F.6/FGA.9
summary: The saying "If it looks right, it’ll fly right” certainly applies to the Hawker Hunter, with its graceful lines and curves.

name: MicroLeague Wrestling
summary: Hulk Hogan, Randy Savage, and other superstars of the then-WWF appeared in this turn-based wrestling game - the first licensed WWF game for any platform.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Seychelles
summary: The world-famous tropical paradise of the extensive Seychelles island group has now come to FSX: Steam Edition! Located in the Indian Ocean, north of Madagascar and approximately 600 nautical miles away from the African continent, the Seychelles consist mostly of coral islands with more mountainous terrain on the islands Mahé and Praslin...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Discover Great Britain
summary: Great Britain is described as one of the most beautiful places on the planet. Take the opportunity to put that description to the test with a series of flight adventures that encompass the length and breadth of Great Britain, Ireland and the Channel Islands.

name: MilkwaySubway
summary: 《MlikwaySubway》 is a sci-fi 2.5D RPG.Players need to play the role of scientific researchers Miallai, explore the vast universe, go through thick and thin together with Octo，see the truth of the "ashes", and ultimately continue the flame of civilization.

name: Mind Diver
summary: Restore a broken mind to solve a twisted case. Investigate a couple's most intimate moments and piece together the events of a fateful night. Pick what to investigate, deduce awful truths, and solve a dark mystery. But most of all, Mind Diver: find the lost love. Before it's too late.

name: Missing Parts: The Tantei Stories
summary: The first entry in the cult classic adventure game series by F.O.G.

name: Minnie's Fruit Fiasco
summary: A Puzzloop or Zuma clone.

name: Mimimishka
summary: The game is a classic puzzle. You have to go through all ten stages, as well as three levels of difficulty, in which pleasant surprises await you.

name: Miner
summary: Pick up your pickaxe!!!Make your inference, use the best strategy and highest speed, DIG THEM ALL!!!

name: Mission Mars
summary: The player has to navigate a spaceship through the caverns of Mars in this action game published by Solar Software.

name: Mind Reader
summary: Mind Reader is a Yume Nikki fangame. Mind Reader's protagonist is Appuru, a boy unable to leave his room, instead exploring a dream world through sleeping. Appuru's dreams are colorful and sometimes vague, despite the general lack of sound.

name: Miner Clicker
summary: Casual idle mining game: Click to extract minerals, buy and sell based on fluctuating prices, and invest in auto miners to expand.

name: Middle Manager of Justice
summary: Double Fine's first iOS game. The player recruits and trains a group of superheroes.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Grumman EA-6B Prowler
summary: Virtavia’s Grumman EA-6B Prowler is the ideal addition to your virtual modern military fleet! The Grumman EA-6B is an American attack aircraft derived from the A-6 Intruder. The EA-6B variant has been developed into a long-range, all-weather, advanced electronic countermeasures platform, and is often used for gathering radio intelligence.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: San Francisco
summary: US Cities X: San Francisco is an excellent add-on for FSX:SE which should be explored, experienced and enjoyed. Many of the famous areas around the city are included, such as the Golden Gate Bridge and the bay area.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Catalina Airport (KAVX)
summary: Fall off this mountain top and the only way is down - and don’t forget to fuel up for the round trip! Catalina Airport (KAVX) is situated on Santa Catalina Island and is known as the ‘Airport in the Sky’ due to its elevation at 1,602ft (488m) above sea level.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna CT210M Centurion II
summary: The 210M Centurion has been designed to push the limits of what can be achieved in these host simulators and delivers high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.

name: Minions. Five nights at Despicable Hospital 3D
Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Indianapolis
summary: US Cities X: Indianapolis from Aerosoft covers the Indianapolis area in FSX:SE with extensive satellite coverage and includes all major buildings and thousands of accurately placed autogen buildings. There are nine detailed heliports, complete with sound effects, and the famous Indianapolis Speedway is also modeled.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Discover Australia and New Zealand
summary: Explore some of the most dramatic scenery on Earth with the latest action-packed mission add-on from First Class Simulations! Australia and New Zealand have much to offer pilots, from spectacular coastlines to a wild and rugged interior. Will, your tour guide, offers local aviation and general knowledge while you explore the region.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna C207 Skywagon
summary: Alabeo's C207 Skywagon package for FSX brings you the regular and bush variants of the aircraft in five paint schemes - the bush variant liveries really look the part!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft D17 Staggerwing
summary: The Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition rendition of the Beechcraft D17 Staggerwing, is a beautifully detailed and accurate aircraft. The D17 has a distinctive and unusual staggered biplane configuration with the upper wing offset from the lower wing.

summary: The City of Steamboat Springs is an internationally known winter ski resort destination. The Steamboat Springs tourism industry is highlighted by Steamboat Ski Resort, which is on Mount Werner in the Park Range just east of the town.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Barcelona
summary: Barcelona is the capital city of the autonomous community of Catalonia in the Kingdom of Spain, as well as the country's second most populous municipality, with a population of 1.6 million within city limits. Founded as a Roman city, in the Middle Ages Barcelona became the capital of the County of Barcelona.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Rockwell B-1B Lancer

The aircraft, while not technically stealth-capable, is designed to present only a fraction of the radar profile of earlier large bomber types and incorporates extremely advanced...

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - VFR Real Scenery NexGen 3D - Vol. 4: Scotland
summary: Just Flight's NexGen 3D series of UK photographic scenery combines high resolution photographic textures with accurately placed autogen objects and additional custom scenery objects to give a true '3D' feel to your VFR flights.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Inverness Airport (EGPE)
summary: The SIM720 Inverness Airport download has been created as a replica of the real world site. The package includes a wealth of custom created and placed objects, and a high resolution ground polygon. In addition, the precision placement of runways and taxiways, and the custom night-lighting, provides incredibly realistic take-off and landing experiences. The Inverness Airport download has been designed for high compatibility and includes photo real blending with Default, Orbx FTX Scotland and Horizon. It’s also DX10 compatible and includes a separate configurator tool which enables you to configure settings such as AI traffic and scenery compatibility.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - P-51D Mustang

And no wonder. For the P51 is truly a pilot's airplane.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Stinson L-5 Sentinel

Rugged and dependable, the design is a true 'workhorse', showing little to no concern for aesthetics and equipped with no unnecessary embellishments.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Night Environment Italy

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Velocity XL RG

The product is based on SPOT5 multispectral satellite images geometrically and radiometrically corrected to create a seamless mosaic. The scenery reproduces the real ground surface characteristics using 2.

summary: Just Flight's NexGen 3D series of UK photographic scenery combines high resolution photographic textures with accurately placed autogen objects and additional custom scenery objects to give a true '3D' feel to your VFR flights.

name: Mightier
summary:
Step away from the computer!

Welcome to Mightier, the action puzzler that pulls you away from the screen to solve puzzles by hand with pencil and paper.

Using a color printer and web camera, the game prints puzzle pages for you to draw on, then captures the results when you're done.

From your drawings, Mightier constructs a landscape and characters for a fun and engaging 3d platformer.

Drawing by hand is a lot more fun, but the game also supports mouse drawing for those without a printer, webcam, or spare paper.

Product description

Mightier is an independent puzzle action game developed by Lucas Pope and Keiko Ishizaka.

Play as the Engineer and the Actionaut to solve puzzles and collect items in each sector.

Key features
Puzzle, action gameplay. Webcam and printer integration.

name: Mini Army Tactics Medieval
summary: Casual turn-based strategy game set in a fantasy Medieval era. Strategically command your troops on the battlefield to crush your opponent in combat. Use your troops abilities carefully to turn the tide of battle in your favor. Do you have what it takes to win the war?

name: Mikeyeldey95

name: Minna no Shiiku Series 1: Boku no Kabuto Mushi
summary: Boku no Kabuto Mushi is an Action game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2001.

summary: Mindcell is the third-person adventure in the world of the near future. The protagonist is sentenced to become material for scientific experiments, but he’s not going to put up with such a fate at all. In search of a way out, he must recall what happened to him and how he got here. The persecutors will not leave the fugitive alone, wherever he’s going. And there is a serious confrontation ahead. Going through the story with the main character, try to find out the goals of your pursuers and understand who your real ally is.

Grab your club and putt your way through more than 50 unique holes spread over 5 zany courses! You'll enjoy gorgeous 3D graphics and an ultra-realistic physics engine that guarantees this to be the most original mini golf game around!

name: MisBloody

Embark on an electrifying adventure that combines action and agility in a relentless challenge.

Face deadly enemies while moving swiftly and precisely through complex and perilous environments. This game is a brutal test of reflexes and reasoning, where every decision you make can be the difference between success and failure, or even life and death. Get ready for a breathtaking challenge that will push your mind and skills to the limit.

name: Milfvania Ep. 2

Kick your microtransaction habit by playing a harmless useless clone of AAA games pay-2-win systems.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Granville Gee Bee Model Z

name: MiniTrans
summary: MiniTrans is a city building and traffic simulation game. Players independently build main cities and satellite cities, develop metropolitan areas and city clusters, and build various transportation facilities between urban areas to transport commuters to earn taxes.

name: Miss Piggy's Wedding
summary: Miss Piggy's Wedding was a two-player game created in 1983 for the Atari 2600 console. The game was advertised in Atari catalogs, but never made it to final release, due to Atari's cancellation of their Children's series. A prototype of the game was discovered in the late '90s by a private collector. The object of the game was for one player to maneuver Kermit through the church and outside to a waiting taxi, without getting caught by Miss Piggy (controlled by the second player), who insisted that they be married. The obstacles to Kermit were the wedding guests (represented by blocks in the picture), who try to impede his progress through the maze. He also must touch a key in order to open the doors and escape, although if Miss Piggy touches the key, the doors close again. The most complete version currently known for this game was never finished, so the consequences of Kermit escaping or being caught by Miss Piggy are unknown. Additionally, Gonzo appears at the top of the screen as the minister, yet he has no purpose in the game prototype.

name: Mini Island: Aroma

Useful control stuff that we didn't get a lot of time to explain: 
You control Mimi-Chan with your mouse even after firing 
Hold the left mouse to focus Mimi-Chan and move slowly. 
The faster Mimi-Chan is, the bigger they go boom, but they harder they are to steer.. 
Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out to get a better view.

It also adds new passive mobs, an archaeology system, and the cherry grove biome.

name: Midnight Monorail

name: Mine Battles

name: Minecraft Earth
summary:
"Minecraft Earth is an all-new augmented reality game you can play on your mobile devices that brings the Minecraft world into our universe! Through the lens of the game, you’ll be able to build creations with friends and place them in the real world at life-size. You’ll discover exciting new mobs to use in your builds. And you may need to put your survival skills to the test as you explore a new side to your neighborhood and battle Minecraft mobs in real life!"

The game received its final update in January 2021 and officially shut down on 30 June 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic.

Fly over the Alps and Pyrenees before facing the challenge of the mighty Himalayan range. Explore the Far East and Australia.

summary:
Is an easy to play arcade space shooter, with an endless area to play in and countless Enemies to destroy.

There are 18 ships to unlock and play as.

Many different enemies to blast away at.

HD graphics.

name: Mirakuru! Mimika DS
summary: It is a Japan-exlusive mix of adventure and visual novel focused on cooking.

name: Mig Alley Ace
summary: Set during the Korean War.

name: Mini Game Collection
summary:
Mini Game Collection is a Collection of 3 Mini-Games written by Rick Skrbina: Adventure 1K, Assembly Line & Snake. 
 
Adventure 1K - Plays like the original Adventure, but sized down a bit to compete in the 2010 Mini Game Compo 1K category. You must recover the sacred chalice while avoiding dragons. 
 
Assembly Line - In order to fill your quota, you must key in the proper codes to do your part on the assembly line. If you fail to do so, you'll get fired! 
 
Snake - The classic growing snake game. Eat as many fruits as possible.

Midnight Carnival

Minimally Invasive

summary:
MIYAMOTO is a single player card game with a miniature board.
Game art is simple and oriental world with Samurai.
Also offers fast paced gameplay and strategy for mobile optimized.
This game is not TCG/DCG. Like a Roguelike card game.
The important tactics is when and where and which play your card.
Random deck on each battles will not promise their results, It's up to your tactics.

name: Midas' Odyssey
summary:
Logical puzzle games collection. Unique eye-catching ancient world, devoted to legendary King Midas and it's devine ability to turn everything into Gold by touch. Ability which not actually blessing, but curse. 
 
Start your brain workout with set of several smart and addictive puzzle games. Exercise your mind with more than 1000 unique puzzles. Reveal all comics stories about ancient world.

name: Minha Casa
summary: Awakened in the middle of the night by her own anxiety, Robertha will have to face her own demons beyond her own home.

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two
summary:
Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two continues Jesse's saga in a five-part, narrative-driven, episodic game series developed by Telltale in collaboration with Mojang and members of the Minecraft community. Though players' choices from the first season will carry over into season two, this new season will be accessible to both returning fans and newcomers alike. This second season will also include Telltale's unique multiplayer 'Crowd Play' feature, which allows friends and family to engage with the adventure together by helping to decide the direction of the story from any mobile device with an online connection.

Now that Jesse and the gang have vanquished the Wither Storm, saved the world, and become totally super famous heroes, life has gotten a bit more...complicated. With more responsibilities and less time for adventure, old friendships have started to fade -- at least until Jesse's hand gets stuck in a creepy gauntlet that belongs to an ancient underwater temple. Together with old pals and new comrades alike, Jesse embarks on a brand new journey filled with tough choices, good times, and at least one temperamental llama.

name: Midnight at the Red Light : An Investigation
summary: A private investigator must trace the clue's to find a missing prostitute. She is known to be associated with a cult whom maybe be holding her against her will.

name: Missing Time

name: Mine Clash

name: Mission: Demolition
summary:
The most secure prison facility in the country
is under attack ...
The city mayor called personally and asked you to take care of this problem.

name: Midnight Puppeteer

Mayo and her teddy bear Mister Masper are being driven home one night, when suddenly the car's engine stops.
Her father heads down a nearby path to find help, and when he doesn't return, Mayo and Masper decide to follow.
There, they find a large mansion. And in the search for Mayo's father, they find much more...

name: Miyo TD

The game comes loaded with professionally rendered graphics with the option to swap them out for your own custom experience. Flip through your photo album for possibilities—then the Miyo TD battlefield can be yours! Use your custom heroes to blast through relentless waves of creeps in multiple challenging levels. If you’re looking for a way to bring some serious fun into your tower strategy games, look no further than Miyo TD!

name: Minimalist

name: Mirror Spirits

name: Mini Car Racing: Tiny Split Screen Tournament
summary: Welcome to the one and only tiny split-screen racing tournament! Grab a friend (or none if no one is around), strap on your seat belt, and hit the road in more than 24 hot and lovely designed mini tracks. It’s fast, it’s fun, it’s exciting. It’s time for Mini Car Racing.

name: Miniballist
