name: Miles Edgeworth: Ace Attorney - Shattered Glass
summary:
The world we live in is filled with contradictions. However, some worlds only exist to contradict our own. In a world where prosecutors and defense attorneys are now on opposite sides of the courtroom, is it still possible for the truth to prevail?

It must be possible, for if not... Then what is the point to our existence?

name: Mission: Driver
summary: Start the engine and become a legendary driver! Control a variety of unique vehicles with realistic driving physics. Master dozens of challenging missions and break all the records!

name: Miszou
summary: Relax, Chill or Strive with Lofi in the world of Miszou, a 2.5d Rollerblading Platformer. Customize and make your way through the 4 unique Turtles of Miszou in whatever clothing or skating style that suits you.

name: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack
summary: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack - Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles - Expansion Pack is designed for adults.

name: Midnight Door
summary: A girl befriends a strange and powerful creature; the duo goes on an interdimensional adventure in this 16-bit inspired top-down action-adventure! Explore environments both familiar and fantastical while engaging in precise and strategic combat with bizarre creatures.

name: Miami Vice
summary: Playing as Sonny Crockett and Ricardo Tubbs, the buddy-cop duo from the 80's TV series of the same name, fight to take down a drug ring led by Manuel Ortega in this third-person shooter.

name: Miss Mantis
summary: It is a female-perspective romance visual novel, in which you will play a marriage fraudster who is trapped between three different men, and it's up to you to decide whether you want to put your interests first or fall in love.

name: Mio no Mystery Adventure
summary: You get caught in the rain and hide in the mansion. Upon entry you hear "I've got a present for you - It's your death!" Now you got to solve puzzles, defeat devil, the master of the house and find a way out.

name: Mixology
summary: This is not just any drinking game! Welcome to the Mixology Hostess Club, dear customer! You seem to have accidentally stumbled upon this club but, oh well! Time for drinks and most importantly... the hostesses! Successfully woo them and you could become more than a customer!

name: Mini's Magic World
summary: Mini's Magic World is an action platformer with a diverse cast of characters and levels to explore. Fight bosses, find hidden treasures, follow the rhythm of music, chase or be chased.

name: Minesweeper: Collector
summary: Tired of boring common square levels? Finally there is a brand new minesweeper with different game modes! Each level is a part of collection. Complete collections to obtain keys and gain access for more episodes. Achieve higher levels to unlock new items, chests, pets and much more!

name: Mighty Math Number Heroes
summary: Mighty Math Number Heroes is a computer game by Edmark in the Mighty Math series. It teaches math and has humans and activities.

name: Midnight Grub Session
summary: Get down with the thiccness

name: Million Mazes
summary: Million Mazes brings classic pencil-and-paper mazing to iOS. The game features an algorithm that creates a brand new maze every time.

name: Mistwinter Bay
summary: Rule a town in this story heavy, visual novel-like fantasy RPG! Interact with townsfolk and foreign leaders, build and expand, and tackle randomized events that affect the town and its people.

name: Miner Problem
summary: A game in the ANTINY future. There is no hope there is no jumping.

name: Minna no Joushiki-ryoku TV
summary: Minna no Joushiki Ryoku TV is a Wii video game released in 2008 by Nintendo and HAL Laboratory. It is a game that tests a person's general knowledge and has a goal of enhancing their grasp of information. There are a wide range of categories pertaining to geography, cooking, sports and more. There is an encyclopedia the player can view to gather even more information. The game is a quiz type game and whether or not you give the correct answer the game will give a good in-depth detail. Players can download even more explanations of answers by connecting to Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection.

name: Midnight Drifter: Drift Racing Car Racing Driving Simulator - Premium Edition
Miseria
summary:
"Miseria: World's Apart" 
 
Enter the world of Miseria, where our hero Lurk, the urchin, has been torn from his love and imprisoned by the cold-hearted spider ogre, Grunzel. 
 
Guide him through her fiendish traps and reunite these lovers true. Or they will forever be...

name: Milky Way: TD Survivors Autobattler RTS
summary: Milky Way is a unique mix of Tower Defense, RTS, Auto-Battler and Survivors. Build your base, choose random upgrades and use powerful skills to survive against hordes of enemies.

name: Mind the Vikings
summary: Allow me to welcome you to the land of the vikings. A land where you can build a village full of silly vikings, each with their own weird and quirky traits!

name: Microsoft Hearts
summary: A remake of Microsoft Hearts included in Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: Mirai Shounen Conan Digital Library
summary: A mini game collection based around the anime Mirai Shounen Conan (Future Boy Conan).

name: Mine Seeker
summary: Mine Seeker is a strategic game where the player has to click tiles in order to find mines hidden under some of them. It might seem familiar to many people... If you like to play calming games with peaceful atmosphere you should give it a try!

name: Microsoft Minesweeper
summary: A remake of the original Microsoft Minesweeper bundled in Windows Vista and Windows 7.

name: Mind of the Eyes
summary: "Mind of the Eyes" is a 3D platformer with an open, enchanting world the player can explore freely. With the lovable and stubborn Nimmi, you solve puzzles and prove your dexterity to free the mountain from great harm and learn the truth about the fireflies.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - McDonnell Douglas DC-3
summary: The DC-3 was the aircraft that manufacturers wanted to replace with something better and more modern, but it performed so well that a viable replacement wasn't easy to make - hence the saying, “The only aircraft to replace a DC-3 is another DC-3.”

name: MinerVGA
summary: A game where you buy equipment, then head beneath the town (built over an very strong layer of rock) and do mining in order to become rich and marry the woman of your dreams.

name: Minicraft Deluxe
summary: Minicraft deluxe is a version of the game Minicraft that was developed and released in 2012. It added more features to Minicraft like Archer, Lumberjack, Iron/Gold Boots, etc.

name: Minesweeper
summary: A minesweeper homebrew for the ColecoVision.

name: Micro Hexagon
summary: Micro Hexagon is a minimal action game by Paul Koller, with music by Mikkel Hastrup. This Commodore 64 reinterpretation of the original SUPER HEXAGON was released on the 1st December 2013 as an entry in the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Competition (2013), in which it achieved 2nd place.

name: Missing Road
summary: This is a personal art style escape game by text prompts to find the entrance to the next stage of various stages forward!!

name: Mirages
summary: Mirages is a 3D narrative and horror game with folk stories. One night, seven brides headed to the Captain Mansion but strayed into a place full of ghosts - Regret City. Horror haunts the small town. Due to destiny, actors, warlords, and offspring of the town are drawn in. They are closer to truth.

name: Minescroller
summary: An infinite scrolling minesweeper game. Get coins to unlock stuff!

name: Mission Mars
summary: Level the city to secure your landing!

name: Milton Cumberdale
summary: Don't run into the wall, Milton.

name: Missing
summary: A short VN style game made in RPG Maker in which you try to find out what happened to your missing friend.

name: Mini Golf Simulator
summary: A new style of mini golf game where you swing with the Joy-Con hanging down!

name: Mini-Yonku GB: Let's & Go!! All-Star Battle Max
Midnight Heist
summary: You're a thief who is afraid of darkness, but your boss doesn't know that and he sends you out to do his dirty work in the middle of the night. You must stay on the edge of darkness so you don't pass out and don't get caught by the guards.

name: Misplaced.
summary: Atmospheric puzzle

name: Mini Fish
summary: Mini Fish is an casual arcade minigame for iOS and Android. Players swim downstream as far as they can against waves of enemies. It has retro inspired graphics, and fun upbeat music.

name: Mini Golf Castles
summary: Mini Golf Castles allows up to four players to compete on medieval themed courses, each consisting of nine holes. At first, only one course can be selected, two others can be unlocked through tournament play. Four characters are available for visual representation. The aim is visualized by a punctured line indicating the direction of where the ball will go, the power of the shot is simply controlled by a button press and showed on a bar. There is an eight-stroke limit per hole. Some of the challenges are in tune with the medieval theme, like putting the ball at the right moment into a hole while an armour suit puts a sword down.

name: Midnight Nowhere
summary:
In Midnight Nowhere, you play a man suffering from amnesia who wakes up in the morgue. Half-naked, dead bodies and blood are everywhere. Something is very wrong, but he hasn't a clue what happened, where he is or even who he is. The city of Black Lake, Russia, is in a state of panic because no one has any idea who or what is behind the horrific slaughters - now numbering in the hundreds. Is it a serial killer? ... or is it something even more evil?

You play this point-and-click, mouse-driven game in 3rd-person perspective. Features include animated characters, a mix of 2D and 3D graphical backgrounds and a mood-enhancing soundtrack. To advance the story, find and use inventory objects, read different types of documents, solve various types of puzzles, and talk to numerous characters.

Falling solidly under the Horror category, the subject matter is not for the faint of heart. The strong language and adult sexual themes are in keeping with today's "R-rated" films.

name: Mister Furry
summary: Entertaining Arcade Game, consisting of a Series of Exciting Mini-Games with the Beautiful Furry Boys. Amazing Atmosphere, Great Music, 58 Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks. Join us!

name: Minesweeper: The Clean One
summary: A Minesweeper game with a fast and minimal user interface, and a variety of minimal color schemes.

name: Mine Seeker
summary: A fun and addicting game where you clear a minefield while avoiding the mines. Can you clear all the tiles and earn the title master miner?

name: Mind Muscle VR
summary: Improve your fitness level and mind-muscle connection using virtual reality and the power of visualization.

name: Mi Mi Mi
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2002
summary: 2002's version of Microsoft's long running series of non-combat, commercial flight simulators. The game uses a completely new 3D graphics engine which features photorealistic terrain as well as some nifty effects like jet contrails, volumetric clouds and a completely 3D virtual cockpit for each of the 12 planes in the game (which include the new Cessna 208 Caravan Floatplane and Boeing 747-400).

name: Mini Maker: Make A Thing
summary: A hero thing, a monster thing, a robo thing… in Mini Maker, you can make any ‘thing’! Use an arsenal of plastic limbs, wonky tools, rainbow stickers and googly eyes to assemble creations, please demanding clients, and laugh in the face of perfectionism.

name: Midnight Margo
summary: A narrative-driven roleplaying adventure with a touch of absurdity

name: Millionaire Manor, Robin's Quest, Escape the Lost Kingdom and the Hidden Object Show 2
Miners and Machines
summary: Become a gold mine owner! Find gold in the ground, dig for it, and deliver it to the gold washing plant machine! Build your mining plant and manage machines which take a lot of fuel… Buy new lands and upgrades for your equipment! It’s a real gold fever!

name: Mizbak's Adventure
summary: AKA: Liquid Kids or ミズバク大冒険. A platypus-like cute character throwing water balls action game to begin its adventure.

name: Mio's Fruit Hunt
summary:
Mio's Fruit Hunt is a top-down puzzle game about collecting - you guessed it - fruit! 
 
* Guide Mio through 36 levels and grab all the fruits (or just most of them)! 
* Enjoy the Gameboy Color style visuals and sounds! 
* Every purchase includes a bona fide instruction booklet! 
 
Have fun and try your best to get every single fruit! You never know what kind of rewards you can get!

name: Mist of Chaos
summary: Mist of Chaos is a Strategy game, developed and published by Idea Factory, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: Mini War: Three Kingdoms
summary: Mini War: Three Kingdoms is a minimalist tactical game set in ancient China. You will challenge more than 160 levels with at least 16 different kinds of heroes, to fight various tactical formations alone. One person, defeat the entire ancient army.

name: Mind the Trap
summary:
Venture as mice of chivalry descending into an ever-shifting dungeon filled with golden cheddar. Lethal traps and puzzles—and the greed of your friends—threaten your valiant pursuit for riches and glory. 

How will you and your friends cooperate? When will you betray them? In the end, only the most daring mouse knight can escape alive.

name: Mister Do
summary: You control Mr. Do has he tries to harvest all of the cherries on the screen. However, there are numerous bad guys out to get him! Mr. Do can defend himself from the badguys in two ways: first he can push the apples located throughout the playfield on top of the enemies and crush them. Secondly, Mr. Do is armed with a power ball. This can be thrown to destroy an enemy. Mr. Do has only one power ball, though, so he will need to wait for it to return to him before it can be used again. From time to time an alpha monster will appear on the screen bearing one of the letters in EXTRA. If you use the power ball to destroy an alpha monster you earn that letter; when you've earned the complete word EXTRA you receive an extra life. When you successfully collect all of the cherries, you will move on to the next, more difficult level.

name: MiniWarfare
summary: MiniWarfare is a stylized tactical third-person shooter where two military outposts battle to take control of all nuclear access codes needed to wipe out the enemy team. Explore the island, loot, trade, complete tasks, and collect airdrops to obtain better gear and give your team a major advantage.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Ben Gurion Airport
summary: Ben Gurion airport, which today serves as the entrance and exit gateway of the State of Israel, was established by the British Mandate authorities in the Land of Israel as part of a broad plan to lay down airports in mandate-time (pre-state) Israel.

name: Mitos.is: The Game
summary: The only one cell game with Guild Wars and Competitive Mode, Friends list with messenger, invites, guild chatroom and much more!

name: Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Zukan: Soushuu-hen
Miss Chocolate Eater
summary: A very short visual novel about a lonely, bitter woman running a dusty shop meeting the most beautiful women she's ever met, who are also taking her beloved chocolates.

name: Minotaur
summary: Minotaur was a 2012 horror game by Puppet Combo (formerly Pig Farmer Productions). The game never exited the Alpha development stage but was remade into Power Drill Massacre, in 2015.

name: Mine Royale - Battle Royale
summary: Mine Royale - Battle Royale is the fun new blocky battle royale game. It's a fun single-player and online game! Alot of new updates are coming soon!

name: Miraculous Ladybug & Cat Noir
summary: The only OFFICIAL Miraculous Ladybug app! Enjoy this Paris adventure runner!

name: Mirum Orbis
summary: Mirum Orbis is a 2D MMORPG developed by the French studio Askilian. The game features a variety of classes, an immersive storyline, and challenges to tackle both solo and in groups. It revisits the legacy of classic MMOs through a modern, dynamic, and visually fluid approach.

name: Mission Survive
summary: Mission Survive is an Action game, published by Video Gems, which was released in 1983.

name: Missile Command
summary: Game Boy port of Missile Command, released alongside Asteroids.

name: MicroVolts Surge
summary: Five prototype toy figures, carriers of the revolutionary Micro Battery, have special instructions from their maker to activate others of their kind. But with limited battery resources, they are forced to fight each other for power. Meanwhile, mechanical tracker monsters pose an even greater threat to a Micro World full of broken toys looking for a second chance. The toys are small, but their war is big.

name: Miyaji Shachou no Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen 2
summary: Miyaji Shachou no Pachinko Fan: Shouri Sengen 2 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Pow, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Mite ha Ikenai
summary:
Mite wa Ikenai is a Adventure video game published by Dimple Entertainment released on August 7th, 2008 for the DS.

The idea of the game is to find ghosts from the pictures displayed on the screen and exorcise them by tracing them with a touch pen.

name: Minos Station: Escape Room
summary: You are trapped in one of minos games, an escape room creator, you have several puzzles to solve, and several clues to follow to solve those puzzles, but each time you go to the next escape room, the puzzles are more complicated.

name: Millennium Winter Sports
summary: MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS allows you to experience the thrill of victory and the agony of defeat in eight winter sports. Try to get through the course as fast a possible in the bobsled; out-skate your opponent to the finish line in speed skating; see who can jump the farthest in two separate ski-jumping events; see if you can pull off twists and flips while flying through the air in the aerials competition; strap on the skis and navigate the downhill course; or strap on a snowboard to navigate the giant slalom course. For the ultimate in snowboarding action, try to impress the judges with your performance on the halfpipe. Practice any of the events in the Challenge mode or try to become the best winter athlete in the world with the Championship mode. All of the action of winter sports can be yours with MILLENNIUM WINTER SPORTS.

name: Microdistrict
summary: A short visual novel about mysticism in a post-soviet town with several endings and interactive elements.

name: Mirror Shoot
summary: In Aranet, space is connected through mirrors. You are an agent in Aranet and you need to learn the physics in this planet and fight for resources.

name: Minimize
summary: Immerse your eyes, ears and mind in minimize, a beautiful game of simplification and foresight. Simply swipe to change gravity and minimize each puzzle to where no blocks remain.

name: Mini Island: Night
summary: Mini Island: Night is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim Eastern Europe
summary: Toposim Eastern Europe for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11 / 19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for the whole Eastern Europe region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Midwinter II: Flames of Freedom
summary: The setting is the world following the end of the nuclear winter scenario from the first Midwinter game. Players take on the role of Atlantic Federation's covert operative working to liberate a chain of tropical Slave Isles from the oppressive Saharan Empire, who run the African continent.

name: Miniconomy
summary:
In the free-to-play browser-based game Miniconomy you can trade with thousands of other players. Apart from trading, you can also make a career by being a police officer, mayor of one of the many cities, real estate agent, bank manager or even president. Miniconomy has a great community with active and friendly players.

In the virtual economy, where everyone is on a mission and everyone plays a role, it's up to you to choose how you live your virtual life: Will you be going for riches, power, new friends, or would you rather be a politician?

name: Milf Bar
summary: "Milf Bar" is our new game, with a beautiful boss who needs your help. With beautiful and enhanced 3D!

name: Miburi and Teburi
summary: The journey begins! Explore the various islands and find the treasure Masamune!

name: Mimic
summary: Uncover the mystery of the MIMIC through a psychological horror experience with puzzles along the way.

name: Minder
summary: Based on the British TV series of the same name, you play dodgy businessman Arthur Daley and your aim is to amass as much money as possible in two weeks by buying and selling merchandise of dubious provenance. Assisting you is your bodyguard/minder Terry McCann, while the policeman Sgt. Chisholm is ready to fine you if he catches you with stolen goods.

name: MinSweeper
summary: MinSweeper is a minimalist take on the classic Minesweeper. Simple relaxing game play in which you avoid mines on a puzzle board and try to get the best time. MinSweeper also includes 3 minigames

name: Mines of Moria
summary: Choose one of six playable classes with a randomly selected race. New players are recommended to play as a Warrior.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Rutan Q200
summary: If you're looking for an aircraft which is a little feisty, needs attention and adds some spice to your flying adventures, then the Rutan Q200 is perfect for you. The Rutan Q200 add-on features a 'fictional' version of the famous 1980s Q200 Dragonfly.

name: MindWorks
summary: MindWorks is a VR kaleidoscopic audio visualizer. Create share and enjoy audio visual experiences with your friends in VR.

name: Miboujin Nikki: Akogare no Ano Hito to Hitotsu Yane no Shita
summary: A visual novel from Orcsoft.

name: mini PVP
summary: mini PVP: Multiplayer mini arena battles. Chaotic, frantic, casual. 4 player, 2 minutes long FFA matches.

name: Mitoosis
summary: An organic puzzler.

name: MindFeud
summary: Take your mind on a ride with MindFeud!

name: Missing Critters
summary: Embark on a delightful adventure and seek out the Missing Critters hidden within intricate cartoon scenes, with a soothing lo-fi soundtrack and no time limits - just relax and unwind. Enjoy a captivating experience that will provide fresh challenges, as each play-through is unique.

name: Mixed Guns
summary: Thirsty for a good old Side Scrolling shoot 'em up? Well i got ya covered, fight your way through levels, covered with countless unique enemies, grab your guns and mix them togheter with sick upgrades, to create even sicker guns!

name: Minna no Shiiku Series 2: Boku no Kuwagata
summary: Boku no Kuwagata is an Adventure game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2001.

name: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG
summary: Miners Settlement: Idle RPG is a clicker game which will take you on an open-world adventure full of fantastical creatures. Go on a mighty quest to craft equipment, mine for materials and fight enemies in classic RPG battles!

name: Mirror Angel's Paradise
summary: Explore the remains of the tower Babil and encounter the terrible images left behind by those driven into madness. Rescue the artisan relics that reflect the old world and give you power as you explore the new.

name: Minesweeper
summary: Minesweeper is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Microvolts: Recharged - Starter Pack: Silver 2
summary: MICROVOLTS: Recharged - Starter Pack : Silver 21. MEMBERSHIP (15 days)2. 1,000 RT Coin3. Giant pink bunny hairband

name: Michael English Daibouken
summary:
Michael English Daibouken is an educational game where the character of Michael, an orange cat, teaches kittens the various letters in the English language as well as some English vocabulary. Michael has to catch floating letters in order to spell out English words, while avoiding the incorrect letters. The game has various different backdrops, including space.

The character of Michael comes from the Japanese serial manga strip "What's Michael", created by Makoto Kobayashi which might be considered analogous to Garfield, due to them both being orange cats. It varies between observing goofy pet behavior to more abstract tales of fantasy with anthropomorphized versions of the animal characters.

name: Mine Hero 2
summary: Jonny needs help to recover the 10 diamonds lost inside the mine. Unravel the labyrinths and see yourself become the Hero of the mine.

name: Mikan
summary: A top-down shooter where players must destroy mikan mandarin ornages.

name: Mini Star Math
summary: Mini Star Math is a cute and fun math mental computation game with 26 stages.

name: Misshapen
summary: A story-driven body-horror simulator where you can’t kill your enemies but you can distort their bodies in creepy ways. Grow lumps, build weird living structures and dive into the mysteries of Zheltikov’s military base.

name: Microsoft Train Simulator 2
summary: A planned sequel to Microsoft Train Simulator that was cancelled in 2009.

name: Mitosis
summary: In Mitosis you can become a cell biologist and use different tools to grow a cell population and manipulate its environment. Through manipulation of the environment the conditions of survival change thus the cells have to adapt to their new surrounding. Unlike from similar games you cannot change the cells genome directly but only influence the chances of survival for certain random mutations. This is what evolution is about in reality: Totally random mutation and natural selection.

name: M.I.N.E.
summary: Small economical strategy with military features. Have singleplayer and multiplayer.

name: Micromon
summary:
Embark on an epic monster capture RPG like none other on mobile!

Enter the massive world of Pixekai, where you can capture, train, and battle over 130 fully animated monsters.

Overcome the many challenges on your journey to become the top tamer of Pixekai! Uncover and foil the plans of an evil, secret organization within Pixekai to save this virtual world and your real world!

name: MiniBob
summary: MiniBob is a 2D side view puzzle game, focused on exploring the enviroment, and getting to know the characters. Almost every object has something to tell, some times nothing important, but other times…

name: Miner Rush
summary: A large number of gem mines have been found in the forest. Explore the deepest part of the forest, Dig out the biggest and most beautiful gem king before everyone else

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Complete
Mini Healer
summary: Mini Healer is an MMO inspired RPG where you play as the healer in a party and challenge various bosses in the dungeon. Added with ARPG inspired loot system and deep character customization.

name: Mic
summary: 3 levels, increasing in difficulty and complexity. First, you go through a prison complex before entering an "Anti-Duke" training center where the aliens learn how to fight against Duke. In the finale, you have to find the power plant to shut down the whole installation.

name: Minna no Golf Online
summary: An online based title in the Everybody's Golf series, released only in Japan for PS2. Its server were shut down in 2005.

name: Microcosm
summary:
Time is running out for the corporate mogul Tiron Korsby. A microscopic probe has been injected into his bloodstream by corporate rival Axiom Corporation. A probe that with every beat of his heart is cruising towards his brain to execute it's diabolical mission: total mind control.

Your mission: track down and destroy the probe. Using the latest in micro-submersible equipment, you'll course throughout the strange and menacing world of the veins, arteries and organs inside the body heading for the final confrontation with the "Gray M" probe. Microcosm blows apart the barriers between movies and computer software.

It's a movie packed with furiously addictive gameplay, or a game with visuals to match anything Hollywood can produce? With Microcosm you have the best of both worlds.

name: Mixmob: Racer 1
summary: Racing games lack strategy. Card games are slow. MixMob: Racer 1 mixes both—turning every race into a battle of instinct, reflexes, and high-stakes plays.

name: Midway Presents Arcade Hits: Moon Patrol/Spy Hunter
summary:
Moon Patrol / Spy Hunter is a compilation of the following games:

- Moon Patrol
- Spy Hunter

name: MicroGradient
summary: You are a starship pilot tasked with fending off an eternal alien invasion. You've been given 3 hulls to achieve this mission, and if you lose all three there is always another pilot ready to take up arms.

name: Microscope Madness
summary: A strange virus has attacked the cell cultures in your laboratory, and it's up to you to manipulate the extra large "mother" cells and use them to destroy the attacking mutant motiles!

name: Mirror Land
summary:
Summon the most powerful Fingermon and save the world from the NS Fingermons.
A Mirror Land exists in a dimension different from ours, where Fingermons live.
People called Connectors can summon the Mirror Land Fingermons to our world.
Then one day, someone began to exploit the Fingermons to plunge the world into chaos.
As modern weapons were incapable of harming the magically-protected Fingermons,
Good Connectors, including you, began summon Fingermons to rise up against the evil forces!

name: Missileman
summary:
Missileman is a high-speed, vertically scrolling 2D shooter. You are a man on a missile! Shoot enemies down with missiles. Earn EXP and upgrade your missile. Can you beat all 16 stages across four Zones to ultimately defeat The Eye?
Dodge walls and obstacles that scroll by at ultrasonic speeds while still aiming carefully to target each enemy, one by one. Missileman is a game all about speed and precision!

name: Millie Meter's Nutrition Adventure
summary: In this adventure, Millie Meter finds a family of giants in the forest, and decides to help one of them out with his stomach issues by hopping into his body.

name: Minibash
summary:
A strategic online 2D Fighting Game.
Free today with App of the Day HD
Download the app "App of the Day HD" and discover every day a paid app that becomes free for 24 hours!

name: Mission: Diamond Back
summary: Mission : Diamond Back is a First-Person Shooter that follows the story of a security breach in one of DiamondBack's research units. In order to survive you must Search , Report and Kill.

name: Midnight Pool
summary: Cellphone port of Midnight Pool.

name: Minna no Soft Series: Hyokkori Hyoutan-jima
summary: Minna no Soft Series: Hyokkori Hyoutan-jima is an Action game, published by MTO, which was released in Japan in 2003.

name: Mirage In Darkness
summary: A puzzle platformer adventure game. Darkness is coming. A young kid Del tries to find a way to survive in this situation.

name: Mini Basketball
summary: Put on your sneakers, and get ready to go onto the court in this brand new basketball game! Experience basketball like never before, in this fresh and easy to play basketball game. In Mini Basketball you will enjoy a casual gameplay experience, while still remaining loyal to the original game. It’s time for you to get the crowds roaring in the arenas, score some amazing 3 pointers, and build the strongest team that ever existed!

name: Mitrapunk
summary: Manage software development in huge organization. Select most promising features, negotiate about architecture and ownership, build features and get promoted. All processes are similar to real development in FAANG.

name: Minimal Arcade
summary: three very small games for playdate

name: Minimum Nanonic
summary: Adventure game for PC-FX.

name: Miner 2049er II
summary: The Apple II received another set of Miner 2049er levels in the form of this release, which is often referred to as simply "Miner II."

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Douglas F4D Skyray
summary: When first designed in 1947, the Douglas Skyray was on the cutting edge of aviation technology. In 1948, Douglas Aircraft was contracted to build the F4D-1, with the first flight of a production model taking place in 1954.

name: Minskies
summary: Minskies Furballs is not a port, but a spiritual clone of Puyo Puyo. In a tournament against a cast of crazy characters, you must guide and rotating falling pairs of cats of different colours to make up colour combinations.

name: Mind Switch
summary: "Mind Switch" is the story of Michael Monroe who has dissociative identity disorder. He lost his mother in a fire when he was 7 years old. He grew up in an orphanage where he has been traumatized by evil people. Now , he has to escape from his own mind full of traumas. But, what about the others?...

name: Miner's Mettle
summary: Miner's Mettle is a artillery-based real-time strategy game. On an isolated and lawless mining planet, you'll need accurate shooting and tactical prowess to return safely with precious resources!

name: Miniature Mayhem!
summary: In Miniature Mayhem, mad scientist Victor's experiment goes awry with a rogue gamma ray. Chaos ensues as the Mayhem Miniatures are born. Wreak havoc and compete against friends in hazardous environments filled with power-ups and weapons!

name: Miracle Adventure Esparks
summary: Long before God even born, the Earth was formed by the law of nature. However, Dr. Gallipoli, which appeared from the dark world, scattered and dispersed his own monsters in various places as much as possible and began to conquer the world. One boy and one white monkey went on a journey to find a peaceful stone neutron to defeat Dr. Gallipoli.

name: Mini Star Survivor
summary: Collect stars and use them wisely to become stronger. Use each character's personality to establish a growth strategy. And survive and escape for 5 or 10 days.

name: Midnight Maid Night
summary:
The Midnight Maids are a small, local cleaning service.

After their 2 o'clock appointment abruptly cancels on them, they suddenly find themselves short of funds.

To make up the difference, they accept a side job moving items out of a client's newly purchased mansion.

However, the job proves to be more difficult than expected when the estate's unresolved history begins to resurface.

name: Midtown Madness 2
summary: Midtown Madness 2 is a free roam racing/arcade sequel to Midtown Madness, part of the Midtown Madness series, developed by Angel Studios (now Rockstar San Diego) and published by Microsoft, which features a range of vehicles that can be driven around London and San Francisco.

name: Mizeria
summary: Nuoli finds herself stranded in a mystical land between life and death. With the use of her magical bow, and a unique platforming system, help her escape back to the land of the living, in this old-school inspired 3D Metroidvania.

name: Millistar Raiders
summary:
An exciting fantasy adventure of the commonly acknowledged (?) Avengers!
An Idle RPG of the captain (player) and heroes who go on an expedition to the Devildom!

name: Milano no Arbeit Collection
summary: Help Milano earn money in order to decorate her new house!

name: Minecraft: Holiday Skin Pack 2015
summary:
The holiday spirit is alive and well at Mojang and Microsoft, and we’re excited to share the news of our new Holiday Skins Pack that has launched today for Minecraft: Windows 10 Edition Beta and Minecraft: Pocket Edition!

The Holiday Skins Pack includes 15 festive skins for your characters to enjoy. Spread the spirit of the season by building your very own Santa’s Workshop in a snowy biome of your choice!

name: MiniDrift
summary: Explore, Improve your skill and find the Tokyõ Drift Quest to show the world who you are in this Metroidvania mixes with a drift game.

name: Mind Donor
summary: You take the role of Victoria Frankenstein as she ventures her lab, collecting the pieces to finish her creation. As you do so, you'll soon find out the motive for her research.

name: Minimal Maze
summary: Minimal Maze is a minimalist puzzle game which is played by rotating the mazes.

name: Microsoft Golf 2.0
summary: Microsoft Golf 2.0 (or Multimedia Edition) improved the graphics as well as adding video segments, more voiced samples and sounds for a more interactive experience. The layout of the UI is also changed a bit but the game largerly remained the same.

name: Miss World '96
summary: Miss World is 96 Puzzle arcade game Qix genre of erotica and adult themes developed by COMAD. The goal in the game is to reveal 80% of the silhouette of a beautiful girl on the screen, preventing the monster caze the player in the attempt. Emepzar before the game the player can choose from a selection of beautiful girls, who will be aiming to show in each game.

name: Microsoft Space Simulator
summary: Microsoft Space Simulator is a space flight simulator program, based on Microsoft Flight Simulator for MS-DOS. It was one of the first general-purpose space flight simulators and it incorporated concepts from astrodynamics and celestial mechanics.

name: Micronomicon: Heroes
summary: Classic tactical role-playing fantasy game with turn-based style of combat!

name: Millennia: Altered Destinies
summary: Sci-fi strategy game developed by Take Two Interactive

name: Mithrun Calls
summary: a short visual novel where mithrun chats with a few people

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 8: A Journey's End?
summary: Minecraft: Story Mode is an adventure game set in a Minecraft world. It is a five-part episodic series that will take you to the Nether, the Farlands, the End, and beyond! You will drive how the story flows through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action.

name: Minecraft: Story Mode - Episode 7: Access Denied
summary: Minecraft: Story Mode is an adventure game set in a Minecraft world. It is a five-part episodic series that will take you to the Nether, the Farlands, the End, and beyond! You will drive how the story flows through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action.

name: Minna no Suizokukan
summary: The player helps out at an aquarium by taking care of animals, feeding them, and training them through a series of minigames.

name: Midway Presents Arcade Hits: Joust/Defender
summary: Two games, one cartridge. No quarters required.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - 3D Lights Redux
summary: Experience stunning 3D light effects in Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition! A2A Simulations 3D Lights REDUX casts light out into 3d space, creating stunning visuals and a more immersive flying experience.

name: Microcosm
summary: Build tiny voxel worlds in virtual reality! Microcosm is the game I've wanted to play in VR ever since I saw the Oculus Rift Kickstarter way back in 2012. I picked up a Vive last year, but no one seemed to be making the voxel game I wanted. Finally, I said enough was enough, and just decided to build it myself.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna CT206H Stationair
summary: The HD Series CT206H Stationair has been designed to further push the limits of what can be achieved in these simulations and delivers super high quality detail to satisfy even the most demanding private pilot’s needs.

name: Mistake Souls
summary: Cool classic JRPG with a more adult storyline. Use magic to protect and damage, pump weapons and knowledge. Only cunning and determination will allow you to defeat all the monsters girls.

name: Minimalist Tower Defense: The Last Tower
summary: After the Battle of the Britain, the war to eliminate geometric creations continues Mount Fuji, Cape Storm, Bering Strait, New York And the ultimate goal: the South Pole...

name: Mind Trap
summary: Why do people lie? Try to find a way out of mind labyrinths!

name: Minesweeper 101
summary:
Minesweeper, a refreshingly clean, yet authentic interpretation of the classic strategy/puzzle game. The object of the game is to identify all mine squares by revealing all non-mine squares. The best minesweeper experience available.

FEATURES
- Beginner size preset (upgrade to the full version for five popular presets and custom)
- Save, load, and replay games.
- Mouse path is tracked with replay, and can be displayed.
- Window can be resized at any time
- Area is always opened on the first click.
- Double-click or press both buttons to reveal adjacent squares.
- A Right-click anywhere after a game, or click the clock to start a new game.
- Best times are tracked in a high score table.
- Chording is available for faster play.
- The Inspector tool shows live game statistics.
- Colors can be changed.

NOTICE
A mouse with two separate buttons is ideal for this game. If you use a trackpad or magic mouse, be sure to enable secondary clicks in your system preferences.

name: Miko No Kanata: Curious Tales from the Shrine -Ne no Shou-
summary: A visual novel from fan-na.

name: Micro Invasion
summary: Micro Invasion is an XNA community game

name: MinuteQues‪t‬
summary:
MinuteQuest is a retro-styled, one-finger, time-killing RPG! 
A 2D field where the only choice is to advance or die! 
Kill fearsome enemies, crush immense bosses, level up, acquire riches, and collect ridiculous equipment whilst gradually advancing along the world towards your goal! 
If you've got a bit of pesky time to kill, why not try it out? 
Kill slime, kill time!

name: Mini Continental Saga
summary: Mini Continental Saga is a biotope strategy history card game letting you freely stir small worlds! Human, elf, slime? Or lead your fishman to create your favorite fictional world! One play takes 5 to 30 minutes. Weave a tale that you've seen somewhere before, but doesn't exist anywhere else!!!!

name: Minesweeper
summary: PC Engine version of Minesweeper.

name: Missing: Itsuka Kitto
summary: On the White Day February 14th Yuuki Masahiro received a bar of chocolate in the post. The next year he also gains a bar of chocolate and a message only saying "Missing". From that moment events starts to whirl around him.

name: Missile Defense 3-D
summary: War has been declared between two super powers. At play are real nuclear missiles and the outcome looks dim. If their missiles make contact, there's no chance for survival. Luckily there's hope. You and The Eliminator, the only anti-nuclear laser in operation. Aboard a fugitive space station, you're armed for intervention and your mission is clear: stop all nuclear missiles. But it won't be easy. Because those missiles are being launched at you, too. So play for keeps. This is the most important challenge you may ever face.

name: Midnight Calling: Anabel
summary: On her deathbed, the Queen announced that when she passed, all magic would die with her. But she also foretold that one day, her last living heir would return, restoring the land to its former glory. Years ago, your father set off to explore the Midnight Castle and hasn’t been heard from since. Now, a strange vision of him haunts your dreams, calling out to you for rescue!

name: Mikey Hooks
summary: A 2D platformer game from Noodlecake Studios.

name: Michael Schumacher Racing World Kart 2002
summary: Choose your racing outfit, the color of your Kart, your driver's name and more. Customize the appearance of the upcoming Number One Kart Driver. Learn to drive a Kart and follow the footsteps of the incredibly famous Michael Schumacher. Advance through the different race classes and difficulty levels and win the worldwide championship in the Internet, involving players from all over the World.

name: Miss Kawaii
summary: Surrounded by many beautiful girls, a mind-blowing, sexy journey has started. Relax, clear your mind and enjoy)

name: Microgames Jam Pack
summary:
This is the end result of the Gameboy Microgames Jam held in November of 2022. The goal of the jam was to have everyone work on WarioWare-style microgames that would then be combined together into a single game.

Microgames Jam Pak is that game.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Ultimate
MineSweeper VR
summary: The famous "Minesweeper" is now in virtual reality! Classic gameplay with stunning control and excellent atmosphere!

name: Midnight Animal: A Story of Love and Forgetting
Midnight
summary: Midnight features 7 maps of Doom action with a dark backdrop. Each map is relatively short and aims to present fun and challenging encounters with small numbers of monsters (every map has less than 120 enemies).

name: Midnight Renegade: Recollections
summary: A Victorian 2D action platformer where you shoot and slash through grunts until you reach their boss, the Chief Constable.

name: Midnight Feast
summary: From the creators of The Artifacts and Hilda Bewildered, Midnight Feast is an interactive picture book of 44 pages created especially for the screen.

name: Minor Miner: Mining Action
summary: Avoid the High-Tech Goblins and Conquer the Mines!

name: Mission 3000 A.D.
summary: Good Rip-off of the Atari 2600 game "Asteroids". You are flying in space, trying to dodge or shoot asteroids and escape from the enemy.

name: Mike Piazza's Strike Zone
summary: DIG IN! Over 700 players! All the stadiums! All the teams and uniforms! All in 3D! Unique player editor allows you to create the ultimate athlete. All new 1998 rosters including two new expansion teams: Arizona Diamondbacks and Tampa Bay Devil Rays! Tons of hidden secrets including super-fast pitches, outrageous curve balls, incredible home runs and more! Fantasy Teams: Create your own rotisserie league. Ultra-realistic conditions affect gameplay: Grass and turf. Day and night. Rain or shine.

name: Microsoft Entertainment Pack 3
summary:
Microsoft Entertainment Pack is a collection of casual games for Windows.

This pack includes:
– Fuji Golf
– Klotski
– LifeGenesis
– SkiFree
– TetraVex
– TriPeaks
– WordZap
– IdleWild (a screensaver program)

name: Mini Golf Mania
summary: Mini Golf Mania is a mini golf simulator where you can play in different fields.

name: Micro Slaughter Community Project
summary:
Micro Slaughter Community Project (MSCP for short) is an eighteen-map Doom II megawad for Boom-compatible source ports. The project was led by Bauul and was aimed at creating a set of short and accessible slaughter maps with a par time of five minutes. The WAD uses textures from the OTEX texture set.

It was released on the Doomworld forums on January 28, 2021, and was uploaded to the idgames archive on April 23, 2021. The mapset received an honorable mention at the 2021 Cacowards.

name: Mighty Aphid
summary:
His famous father is aging. His mother is dying. And his big sister is on the moon. So it is up to Avery "Aphid" Cavor to stop the villainous Lady Bug from wrecking the town of Victoria with her horde of monsters!

Run, shoot, swim, and fly. Explore huge levels. Fight big bosses. Earn upgrades.

Relive the early days of 2D platform gaming with this modern action-adventure game.

Plays great with Xbox One, PS4, and MFi gamepads!

name: Mind Strike
summary: What a romp! A mind-jolter that can be played slow, using alternating turns, or fast, with both players simultaneously hooked to the ultimate goal of conquering each other's CASTLE! Playing it slow, it's called MIND STRIKE, and requires quite a bit of strategic thinking. Playing it fast it's called SPEED STRIKE, and it's a dazzler that blends action with strategy! Choose up to 50 playing boards or design your own. Program the computer opponent's skill level (to your or his advantage). Engage in tantalizing confrontations. Combine your pieces for greater strength or split them apart to move farther. Make it as wild or as absorbing as your mind allows it to be!

name: Mighty Slap
summary: Mighty Slap is a Player vs Player Turn Based slapping game. Time your slap with a time based bonus multiplier to land a powerful slap to your opponent. First player to knock out the opponent wins.

name: Milo no Senki 3
summary: In this new entry to the turn-based tactical-RPG Milo no Senki serie, Lord Milo and his group of companions will travel to the realm of the dead in order to bring back their departed friend, Prince Nelson...

name: Mine Blast!
summary: Blast the mine around the screen to reach the goal. Try and get the mine to the goal in as few explosions as possible!

name: Mimpi Volleyball
summary:
Help Mimpi play some ball with the most fantastic creatures.
Enjoy distinctive, fantastic graphic of this minigame that is based on award winning Mimpi the game.

name: Micro Breaker
summary: Micro Breaker - is a fresh take on a brick breaking game with a great and expanded gameplay that you've never seen before. Here you can acquire and upgrade amazing power-ups that will change your odds in more difficult stages. You can unlock different paddles and balls that you can use to beat the high scores and smash your way through the online rankings!

name: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits: Volume 1
summary:
Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits: Volume 1 for Nintendo 64 contains the four Williams-produced games Defender, Joust, Robotron: 2084, and Sinistar plus the two extra games: Root Beer Tapper (Tapper) and Spy Hunter.

It was also released for Dreamcast with the games Bubbles and Defender II (Stargate) instead of Root Beer Tapper (Tapper) and Spy Hunter.

name: Mirror Mirror
summary: A puzzle game where you have to search for letters.

name: Mixels Rush
summary: Use awesome new Mixels and make crazy combinations to beat the annoying Nixels in Mixels Rush!

name: Misfire
summary: Face off against your friends with wacky guns that don't shoot straight! Be the last one standing in either duels or free for all, earn coins to unlock stylish new space suits, and ruin some friendships along the way! Misfire is a Casual PvP Platformer created by the one-man developer Noodle Games.

name: Mighty Block
summary:
The Kingdom of Blockytop has been overrun by Blavos and his minions. Puzzle your way through the kingdom, defeating each henchman and restoring peace to the land.
Launch matched blocks at the enemies to defeat them. Set up chain combos for greater damage and points. Don't let pieces stack to the top, or it's game over. Move and think fast to rack up high scores!

name: Might & Magic Heroes Kingdom
summary: The Might & Magic series comes to the iPad in the form of a free-to-play online multiplayer game.

name: Mist
summary: Short atmospheric first person horror game with elements of quest and shooter about being lost in the middle of nowhere, surrounded by weird mist.

name: Mighty Mike (Power Pete)
summary: Mighty Mike, or Power Pete, is a PC third-person shooter where your hero has to save bunnies throughout five different lands.

name: MitchiriNeko Bubble
summary: Cute and healing bubble shooter game!

name: Miss Cecilia
summary: Miss Cecilia would always be in a position, always thinking of someone who could take her away, but how could anyone ever show up?

name: Mirai: Future
summary: Mirai is a sci-fi shooter with strong role-playing elements. The player controls the protagonist who uses a jetpack to fly through scrolling maze-like environments. Experience points and money are gained from defeating the numerous respawning enemies. Money can be used in the few friendly areas to purchase weapons and items. The player also has to keep an eye on the fuel gauge for the protagonist's jetpack.

name: Mist Monkey: Wanderer
summary: From the mind of award-winning visual artist, Xander Clinthorne, comes a meditative indie-game about wandering and taking it slow. This title takes you deep into a beautiful pixel-art world with flow state inducing gameplay, The Great Monkey's wisdom to discover and a stunning original soundtrack.

name: Mirror Isles
summary: A puzzle game where players teleport between islands via the use of angled mirrors.

name: Minions Battle
summary: Minions.... To your weapons! Take your sniper or M4 and destroy your opponents!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Eurofighter
summary: The Eurofighter Typhoon is a multi-role combat aircraft which first entered service in 2004. It is the result of Europe’s largest military collaborative program. The Eurofighter fleet has accumulated more than 160,000 flying hours around the world, and are featured in seven different international air forces.

name: Minna no Radio Controlled GP + Variety Set
summary:
Minna no Radio Controlled GP
Introducing a radio-controlled game that you can enjoy with easy operation! Let's share Joy-Cons and get excited with up to 6 people!

Includes over 120 types of cars including buggies, rallies, formulas, and trucks!

Let's enjoy two-wheeled driving with a motorcycle-type radio control!

Let's capture the on-road and off-road courses!

You can create your own machines and courses! Let's enjoy the race to your heart's content with the freely assembled machine and your own course!

Bokura no Dai Undoukai
The long-awaited opening of our big athletic meet! Let's have fun competing together!

From familiar events at the athletic meets to slightly unusual events. Introducing a competitive/cooperative party game that can be enjoyed by up to 4 players!

In addition to playing alone, all players are on the same team, separate teams, and 2vs2 battles, etc. Various ways to play are available!

From the classic "tug of war" and "ball case" to the flower-shaped "relay", play all events and compete for victory in [Large Athletic Meet] mode.

Let's enjoy the development that makes you sweat!

Tsukue de Basuke
Your desk is the court! Dribble, shoot, and dunk your way to victory!

Enjoy basketball with easy-to-learn controls!

Enjoy all kinds of stages! From factories to amusement parks!

Customize your team and dunk on your friends!

name: Mille Miglia 2: Great 1000 Miles Rally
summary: Linkable up to 4 players. New enhanced graphics. 8 new race cars. 8 new exciting tracks!

name: Mine
summary: A first-person game that ushers the audience into an “open-mine” and deals with the unknown relationship between raw materials and the virtual spaces that we inhabit.

name: Minecraft Lovehunt
summary: Minecraft Lovehunt is a free-to-play visual novel that was made to celebrate Valentine's Day with the Dream Team fanbase! With 9 endings to go through, I sure hope you're in for a ride.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 2002: Professional Edition
summary:
This is a special edition of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2002 and includes the following additional features:

- Two new aircraft, the Cessna 208 Grand Caravan and the Rayethon BE58 Baron.
- A Flight Instructor's Station which allows a pilot to monitor and interact with students while they fly.
- An editor that can be used to create new buildings and aircraft or to alter the flight physics of existing planes.

name: Mining Factory
summary: Can mine, can fight, and has sisters, collecting more than 30 types of ore such as iron ore, copper ore, manganese ore, chrome ore, vanadium ore, titanium ore, etc. Team up to break through the 100th floor

name: Milly the Dog
summary: Discover an impressive world: Child drawn animated animal characters living in a real pictures and comic style mixed world with pixel art details and aesthetic scenery elements. The best game to introduce children to play video games.

name: Midnight Racing: Long Night
summary: Racing game.

name: Mir2M: The Warrior
summary:
MIR2M: The Warrior writes a new legend from the historical point of 'Legend of Mir2',
the legendary K-fantasy RPG game. A new legend sprouts from the origin.

The world where swords decide the winners, the world where heroes who lust for the true martial destiny and battles could grasp all only with swords.
The world that is open to anyone who strives to become stronger.

From extreme training, you could be the most powerful or the richest.
We await you, the one who's destined to be the legendary hero.

name: MIG-29 Fighter Pilot
summary:
MiG-29: Fighter Pilot is a successor to MiG-29 Fulcrum by Simis; this time the theater of operations is the Middle East. The joined forces of NATO and the Commonwealth of Soviet States are to stop General Hasouz who is seeking to gain control over the world's oil resources. You are the pilot of the Russian-built MiG-29 and you need to accomplish several strategic missions to ensure the success of the operation.

As this is a simulation game, the MiG-29's control panel is recreated (displaying altimeter, compass, thrust indicator, radar and more), and many actions are done manually by the player (such as controlling brakes and landing gear, performing take off and landing, etc.). There are a number of weapons and an automatic targeting system to help successfully accomplish the missions. The MiG-29 is also equipped with flares and chaff used to avoid enemy fire.

The game is divided into 5 missions plus a tutorial mission. Mission objectives include destroying the enemy's command control and communications systems, escorting a submarine to safety, and destroying enemy Scud missiles. Mission score is based on the number of enemy structures and craft destroyed.

The game features real-time 3D polygon graphics and there are even several short video clips, something very uncommon for Genesis hardware.

name: Mineralis
summary: Think, talk, and fight through moral dilemmas and hand-crafted Japanese RPG combat. Test your tactical mastery. Become a better person. Gain karma and create history in a land torn by conflict. Do you have what it takes to overcome fate?

name: Midnight Evil
summary: It's late at night and you've discovered a mysterious book that seems to have its own evil agenda. As you begin to read through it, you realize that you are not alone.The only way to free yourself from this fiendish nightmare is to finish reading.

name: Micro Manager: 90 Days Probation
summary: Live your life on your term in this modern coming of age work simulator. With various activities. The Manager doesn't like Slackers so watch out for his disappointment stance as he deducts points from your performance score.

name: Micro Battles 2
summary:
Micro Battles are back on popular request!
Gather your friends for another series of head to head mini-games, inspired by the fun simplicity of classic 8-bit video games.
Using two buttons (one for each player) on a single device, you can place your portable battleground practically anywhere and laugh out loud with (or at) any friend you'd like.

name: Mini-Mario Factory Game!
summary: Mini-Mario Factory Game! was an online Adobe Flash game published by Nintendo to promote the release of Mario vs. Donkey Kong on the Game Boy Advance. It could be played from the official Mario vs. Donkey Kong website.

name: Mistborn: Birthright
summary: An upcoming RPG based on Brandon Sanderson’s fantasy series Mistborn.

name: Mission Ring Possible
summary: This FPS turns you into dangerous circle of gondolas to fight the towers of alians invasion down. Optimized for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

name: Miniplanet
summary: Miniplanet is a virtual world game that you could play on Facebook or Bebo.

name: Minna no Soft Series: Tetris Advance
summary: Minna no Soft Series: Tetris Advance, known in-game simply as Tetris Advance, is a falling-block puzzle game. Part of Success's Minna no Soft series, Tetris Advance includes the standard game of Tetris along with a mission-based "Challenge" mode that tasks players with completing specific objectives (such as erasing lines, or clearing an entire board with a certain piece arrangement). It also includes linked Single-Pak Multiplayer support for up to four players.

name: Miai Kekkon Shita Osanazuma ga Otoko no Ko Datta Ken
summary: A visual novel from Honey Mary.

name: Midnight Train: Going Anywhere
summary: Pudding takes a commute and chats with a passenger. There are three endings.

name: MistDominion WorldGenerator
summary: Procedural WorldBuilder that creates a fully traversable world as you explore it, to be used in Project MistDominion

name: Mini Pipes
summary: Mini Pipes is a game that mixes minimalist puzzle and puzzle pipes. Rotate all pipes until all water connections are closed.

name: Mirror Party
summary: Come out and party with bishojos from the Mirror series in a world of fun mini-games featuring online mode. There’s also a Gacha Machine where you can easily get OVER 300 pieces of collectibles (1000+ when upon formal release): CGs/Cosplay Album/Video/OST and more!

name: Mikene's Aspects
summary: Guide Mikene in the search for the 7 Aspects of Balance to achieve Omnipotence and put an end to the problem plaguing the city of Farzin once and for all. Dive into hordes of enemies in this frantic hack n' slash in the best Soulslike style!

name: MilkyWay: Galaxy Adventure
summary: A shooter game that you can play by touch. You can enjoy making constellations, collecting costumes, and talking!

name: Mirror and Queen
summary: Your mirror never lies. A game written by Chandler Groover for the 2016 Interactive Fiction Competition.

name: Mineswifter
summary:
Minesweeper – it's all fun and games until that 50/50 guess. So we decided to remove the guessing. 
 
Mineswifter uses an advanced Minesweeper AI to make sure each board is solvable before giving it to you. This lets you skip the nonsense and SWIFTLY go to the boards you actually wanted to play.

name: Micro Wars
summary: Micro Wars is a fast-paced real time strategy game that throws you into the action in short, intense online battles featuring up to 8 players. Tailor your strategy with a variety of commanders and units, build your base, mine some minerals, and micro your way to victory. Hone your skills with the campaign and custom maps, and demonstrate your prowess to climb the ranks!

name: Mini Mart
summary: Stock up and rejuvenate your quaint mini mart as you build friendships in this relaxing, short, mini town sim.

name: Minecraft: Star Wars - Path of the Jedi
summary: For Minecraft players who want to experience the thrill of being a Jedi Knight, Minecraft Star Wars: Path of the Jedi offers an immersive experience that lets you train as a padawan, battle monsters, duel other Jedi, and master the force. Support the Jedi council during the clone wars and join on a special mission with Yoda to uncover the mysteries of an uncharted planet. The experience is complete with your droid companion by your side and lightsaber at the ready.

name: Missile Control
summary:
Missile Control is a Missile Command-style game. The player has to defend their cities from incoming bombs fire by alien spaceships.

The player controls a cursor on the screen which indicates the direction of fire for the defense missiles. Once launched, they travel in a straight line from the launcher through the point the player specified until they hit an object. Each level is won by destroying all alien spaceships. The player loses once all their cities are destroyed. Bonus cities can be obtained by destroying a sufficient number of alien spacecraft.

name: Miner Lou
summary: Mine and combine gems for your defenses. Play Arcade Mode or accompany Lou on a journey to save the Star Babies in story mode.

name: Midnight Mysteries: Salem Witch Trials
summary: Second release of Midnight Mysteries from Big Fish Games.

name: Mister Smith & His Adventures
summary:
The action-packed comedy adventures of Mister Smith, where you select your path!
Make your way through interactive comedy plots in Mister Smith & His Adventures where you decide how the adventure ends. Be clever or dumb, kind or evil, logical or insane – the choices are yours and each outcome is unique! Which is more important: your phone or your date? Who would you save: yourself or your cat? What is the capital of France? Oh yes - as well as the storylines there are trivia quizzes! Everybody loves quizzes!

name: Mighty Castles
summary: Mighty Castles is a tower defense game with RPG elements. Defend your castle from the evil undead. Use strategy and arrange your buildings around the game world, which will become the main support in your defense. Upgrade every tower skill and use tactics in battle!

name: Milford Heaven - Luken's Chronicles
summary: Milford Heaven, a small medieval village, is under attack!! Won't you do nothing? Luken's castle is filled with treasures! Come, help the villagers, loot Luken's castle and became as rich as you have never dreamed before!

name: Mission on Thunderhead
summary: A sci-fi game which includes a mix of maze puzzles and side-scrolling action.

name: Mickey Mania 7
summary: Mickey Mania 7 (米奇吉鼠) is a pirated port of Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse, released on the Famicom. It was developed by Ei-How Yang in 1996 and is the second game that was developed for J.Y. Company.

name: Mini Island Challenge Bundle
summary: Choose your character, gather power-ups, and beat the bosses! Run through the four worlds and face the threat - run, shoot, dodge! Explore the four islands, each with a unique theme, and beat their challenges. Casual-friendly mechanics, straight forward gameplay, and the unique art style make the perfect, easy-to-grab entertainment. No time to waste - choose your arsenal, build your character with power-ups, and beat the Mini Island Challenge Bundle!

name: Mine Storm II

You may survive the floating mines, but beware of the fireball, magnetic, and treacherous fireball-magnetic mines . . . 13 fields, each one more difficult, await you!

name: Mind Palace
summary: Explore your own notes in this experimental VR journey. Climb, jump & slide along the way on your adventure of buildung your personal mind palace. Make connections and place node-bubbles to arrange your notes in memorable places.

name: Mist of the Dark
summary: Mist of the Dark is a multiplayer psychological horror game where teams of soldiers battle a monster.

name: Midnight
summary:
In this golf-like game your task is to guide a little square shaped fairy, Midnight.
Use your mouse to launch Midnight, but watch out this world is full of danger.

name: Minecraft: Caves & Cliffs - Part II

name: Missing

name: Missile Command

name: Mimics the Bots

name: Miami Chase

Driving a souped-up F40, your objective is to scour the streets of Miami, locate and destroy the red cars driven by the criminals. Once all the red cars are eliminated, the exit to the current level will open, allowing you to confront the yellow car-driving crime lord. However, you must be cautious, as reckless driving near other police cars will result in being stopped, costing you valuable time. Using the city map, you must navigate the streets, destroy the criminal elements, and complete your mission within the tight 48-hour deadline.

In 1992, an enhanced MS-DOS version, featuring golf instructor David Leadbetter, was released in the United States as David Leadbetter's Greens and in the United Kingdom as David Leadbetter's Golf. The game's variety was praised, and some critics considered it the best golf game available.

Mist Legacy use turn-based combat, skill-based progression and material distribution scheme for crafting.

Now it's your turn to sit behind the wheel of these incredible classic cars and race over 10 tracks through italian towns, cities and stunning countryside.

name: Midway Arcade Treasures
summary:
Midway Arcade Treasures is a collection of 24 arcade games developed by Digital Eclipse and released by Midway for the GameCube, PlayStation 2, Xbox and PC.

Midway followed up the Arcade Treasures with successive compilations featuring different games: Midway Arcade Treasures 2, Midway Arcade Treasures 3, the portable Midway Arcade Treasures: Extended Play and the Windows-exclusive Midway Arcade Treasures Deluxe Edition.

After Midway's bankruptcy, Warner Bros. owns the rights and released another arcade compilation called Midway Arcade Origins for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 which includes 29 select games from Volumes 1 and 2 plus Super Off Road from Volume 3. It also contains Vindicators Part II which replaced the original Vindicators from Midway Arcade Treasures.

name: Mine Crazy: The Korean Grinder
summary: This is the essence of Korean grinder MMO. In game, you'll mine rocks, earn money, and reinforce your pickaxe with that money.

name: Mix Hentai Girls
summary: Puzzle game to relax and enjoy your life in the best manner

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - North American F-86F-1 Sabre

First introduced in 1949 for the United States Air Force, the F-86 featured excellent performance for its day, outstanding handling characteristics, and high adaptability. The Sabre served in a number of NATO-aligned countries and was even produced in Canada.

name: Mini Minny and the Missing Magic
summary: Find all of the items and clean up the mess before your mom gets home!

name: Microprose Pro Soccer
summary:
This soccer simulation was programmed by "Sensible Software" (known through "Wizball" and "SEUCK") and published by "Microprose" (which until then had made a name for themselves with mostly warlike simulations). The game consists of two different soccer simulations, you can carry out a match in the stadium or indoors. The field is always shown from the top and scrolled softly into all directions. The player that is controlled at the moment can be recognized by a flickering football shirt. If you have the ball you can pass or shoot. The longer you keep the fire button pressed, the sharper the shot will be. Additionally, the trajectory bends if the joystick is pressed to the left or right. If the opponent has the ball, you can try to take it away from him with a sliding tackle. When the own keeper gets visible, you take over his controls and a press on the fire button makes the keeper jump.

Indoor soccer has some fundemental changes to the rules. The ball cannot roll into the out, but it bounces from the cushion. Furthermore, the keeper can be the goalgetter himself (in contrast to the stadium where he is limited to the penalty area).

If a goal is scored, the scene is repeated in slow motion and one can watch the attack unhurriedly. Extensive and clearly arranged menus enable you to change many parameters of "Microprose Soccer". These range from the length of a match (2 to 12 minutes) to details of the controls. Also the weather can be changed and by this you can get a proper rain shower during the game by coincidence. With a wet ground the ball rolls further and the players sometimes slip.

Different game modes make for diversity. Up to 15 players can enter their names and then compete with each other in a league. One can also take part in a World Cup, whereby the venue corresponds to the one of a real World Cup. The computer takes over the controls of as many teams as needed. The strengths of the teams correspond approximately to the real national teams (random exceptions can happen). Scores can be saved any time and additionally there is a "Name Bank", a database with names of clubs, but there is limited memory, 16 clubs can be created. Therefore you cannot import the whole Premier League, but it is enough for an own league.

name: Miscreated: Canyonlands

name: Midsummer Night

Mini Dash is a 2D fast-paced platforming game from PlayCreek LLC.

Mini Dash is a frenetic, fun, fast platformer that oozes quality. Full of ideas and unexpected turns, it will have you hooked the moment you tap its beautifully formed icon!

Take control of our hero and dash into the trap-filled worlds of Mini Dash. It's the classic left, right, jump controls but it a world turned, literally, on its head! Mithos is a side-scrolling action game. In the game the player controls an archer centaur called Ahyzar, who must recover the seven lost magic coins of his god Krosar. To accomplish this the player must go through the Olympus. With only three lives to find the coins the player must try to avoid or destroy, all the mythological creatures that cross Ahyzar's path.

name: Minutescape
