name: Minecraft: Nerf World
summary: Gear up for an epic Nerf x Minecraft adventure! Dive into a world of foam-flinging fun as you blast your way through hordes of Minecraft mobs, and unlock dimension-themed arenas. Jump into the blocky chaos and charge towards victory, it's a Nerf battle like never before!

name: Military Attack
summary: Herman, a member of the armed forces, was assigned, along with his platoon, to locate a large-caliber weapon that is in possession of the enemy country's army.

name: Mind Hunt
summary: Mind Hunt is a solo/multiplayer detective like game (1-10 players), where you as an agent try to find out which androids are infected in order to shut them down! Well, if you are the infected one, you better blend with other androids and complete all tasks necessary!

name: Mindworks: The Great Division
summary: A choice-based visual novel game about science, division, and the false ideology of knowledge. Each and every one of your choices will determine whether the disciplines will end in unity or complete division. The key to eternal knowledge is in your hands.

name: Missing Pictures: Catherine Hardwicke
summary: For every movie made, dozens of pictures remain missing forever. In the VR documentary experience Missing Pictures: Catherine Hardwicke, the American filmmaker tells how she unsuccessfully tried to adapt the cult book "The Monkey Wrench Gang", a precursor to eco-activism.

name: Mirage
summary: Jump through mystical desert ruins and shoot the bird-like guards to steal their treasure.

name: Military Crusaders
summary: Build your military state, create an army, lead your crusade and crush the enemy

name: Millumi
summary: You've never thought about playing as a sheep solving mirror puzzles—until now. Millumi is a minimalist puzzle game where you are guided by a crow, directing light beams through mirrors to solve various puzzles. You'll face obstacles, mechanisms, and progressively challenging levels.

name: MILF Conditioning
summary: You happened to save a MILF who happened to be the wife of your landlord, yet she had a weak character that didn't match her status – she couldn't refuse others. Having learnt that, would you take advantage and sleep with the beautiful landlady?

name: Milo
summary: Survive an onslaught of cult adherents that worship a mysterious beverage

name: Mind's Eye: Secrets of the Forgotten
summary: Follow an enterprising journalist who smells murderous intent behind what everyone assumes was a suicide.

name: Mind Portal
summary: A beautiful, low poly stylized, first-person exploration game centered around three things: interesting story, hard mazes and atmospheric music.

name: Misty no Kira-kira Hanjouki
summary: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Mickey Mania: The Timeless Adventures of Mickey Mouse
summary:
Mickey Mouse gets a chance to go down memory lane and walk through the timeless adventures he has lived. Mickey Mania is a platformer where all the levels are based on Mickey's most famous cartoons. The levels range about 75 years, starting off with "Steamboat Willie" and going all the way to "The Prince and the Pauper".

The gameplay consists mostly of jumping and marble throwing at enemies, with an occasional puzzle element.

The Sega Genesis version has an additional level not present in the Super NES version, released a month prior.

name: MiedoW
summary: MiedoW is a homebrew adventure game for the NES.

name: Mini Gunn
summary: A fan-made, fun-sized version of Samurai GUNN 2.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
summary:
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is a video game for the Sega CD console. It was produced by Sega TruVideo and released by Sega in US and Europe in 1994. The game consists mostly of footage from nine episodes of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers TV series, which featured footage from Kyōryū Sentai Zyuranger.

Gameplay requires the player to press certain buttons at precise moments throughout the game as they appear on screen. If the player misses, the health meter will drop. However, there are points in the game where the player can press a button unprompted for extra points. At the end of each level, the player's progress is tallied. The points earned will be used to refill the player's health meter and can even score an extra life. Footage from episodes of the television series was used for the game. This footage was heavily cut down for disc space and level length. As a result, the five-part "Green With Evil" serial was turned into four small segments for the game.

The game has a total of ten levels. Levels six and seven are playable only on normal and hard modes, and levels eight, nine, and ten are playable only on hard mode.

name: Miglorn
summary: Gather resources and strategically build up your Viking settlement by day, fortifying it to withstand the relentless onslaught of skeletons by night

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim South Asia
summary: Toposim South Asia for FSX: Steam Edition provides LOD 11/19m Multi-LOD terrain mesh for South Asia, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Millennium Racer: Y2K Fighters
summary: In the third millennium the network knows no boundaries, there is but a single limit, saturation. Speed is the rarest commodity on the web. Network gamers can now transport vital data using their 'virtual-self' riding Virtual Bikes. Speed can be very profitable. The faster you go - the bigger your reputation! Challenge mercenaries of cyber reality to t.come the quickest and most notorious racer on the net.

name: Mini Tank
summary: Mini tank is a simple style of strategy shooting game.It's hard to forget the impact of the game. Ready?Enter the mini tank world with me!

name: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing
summary: Mike Tyson Boxing proves that one of history's oldest sports is also one of its bloodiest. The game allows boxers to deliver intense pain to their opponents with 600 brutal power punches, illegal moves, signature blows, and combos. As one of the game's professional pugilists, or your own customized fighter, you'll work your way through the bronze and silver ranks for a one-on-one meeting with Mike Tyson.

name: Mirage Realms
summary: An independently developed retro 2D MMORPG for Android, PC, Linux and OSX.

name: Mind At Sea
summary: A first person psychological-horror set in the mind of a drowning person's final moments.

name: Mine Sweeper
summary: Mine Sweeper is two player game. Each player controls a boat that can place mines. The game plays like a typical light-cycle game such as Blockade. The boats leave continuous trails of mines behind. Players can only turn at 90 degree angles. To win a player must last longer than your opponent before hitting the borders of the screen or a solid line of mines (first person to hit something loses). The game is over when a player has six points.

name: Mikoto Memory
summary:
A mid-length novel game containing two stories.
Pandora Diary — a story where Mikoto tells a “certain someone” about her sins, her loves and her vow, and “he” who atoned for those sins.
Happy Birthday • Happy End — Several years after Matarou turns himself in, leaving behind Mikoto and Mitarou. Several years later, on April 27th, Mikoto and Mitarou hold a birthday party for Mikoto's birthday. In the meanwhile, the police are informed of an escaped inmate in the neighborhood...

A fandisc of Mikoto Nikki.

name: Millville
summary: Build a small village from the grounds up, meet and interact with its people and try to bring all different Villagers into your little town!

name: Mighty Math Carnival Countdown
summary: The first game in the Mighty Math edutainment series.

name: Midnight Pulse
summary: In this stylish rhythm platformer you will traverse an obstacle ridden terrain while listening to a wide variety of music. Listen carefully because you must base your movements off the music to successfully complete each level. Equiped with a fully functional level editor create levels with your own music and share them with your friends!

name: Miss Perfect Miss Ending
summary: Miss Perfect Miss Ending is a detective game where you talk to Pretty, solving puzzles, finding secrets and unlock numerous endings!

name: Mist of the Undead
summary: Mist of the Undead is the perfect laid back shoot em up zombies game. Fight off endless rounds of zombies meanwhile upgrading your weapons to do serious damage. Speed around the map with the speed boost and super jump. Purchase armor, or don't, can you survive?

name: Misty Girls
summary: After several failures, unfortunately you were put into the trial by the Boss as a new trial product. You have no choice but to go forward. What will be the result. . .

name: Mission Mars Mobile
summary:
Mission Mars is an offline action 3D FPS inspired by the shooters of the 1990s.
The game features an intense single player experience set on Mars in the 22nd century.
You are part of a crew on a mission to Mars. The plan is to land on Mars for exploration and colonization. The flight and landing were successful. During construction of a base something went wrong. There was an explosion, the base is destroyed. You are the only one who survived. A spacecraft used in the mission is undamaged. The goal is to get to the spacecraft and return to Earth. The path to the spacecraft leads through three maps situated on the Mars surface and underground.

name: Mithronia: Tower Wars
summary: Mithronia Tower War is a tower defense game enriched with rogue-like features. You'll construct towers and utilize abilities tailored to your preferences. Protect the mystical quartet of ancient trees, with each tree representing a sacred element - fire, water, earth, and air - brought to life.

name: Might
summary: Might is a team arena brawler with fun and fast-paced combat. Choose from many different classes, each with their own unique style. Classes are easy to pick up and play but mastering them is harder.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Air Alaska
summary: Air Alaska is a DLC for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition. In this challenging, story-driven mission pack you will work your way up through the ranks of a quirky Alaskan air charter operation.

name: Microsoft Bingo
summary: Microsoft Bingo is a free-to-play, microtransaction- and ad-supported bingo game that has players level up and unlock new areas as they play shared online games of bingo.

name: Minecraft: Apple TV Edition
summary: The version was officially discontinued with a message provided via the in-game patch notes and removed from the Apple TV Store on September 24, 2018.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Piper PA-28-181 Archer II
summary: The Piper PA-28-181 Archer II is a single engine GA aircraft, configured with the fuselage over the wings. A development of the PA-28 series which began with the Cherokee, the Archer II is slightly larger in fuselage length and wingspan, and is equipped with a 180hp engine.

name: Mini Guns
summary: Mini Guns is a cross-platform real-time multiplayer strategy game. Play as different factions and dominate the battlefield with a wide range of Units known as Minis! Minis come in all forms and sizes such as soldiers, planes, tanks and much more!

name: Mirror Amusement Park
summary: This is a never-ending game of chess played with patients who are modeled after characters from Alice in Mirror. Use your counseling skills to escape from the abandoned amusement park with your friends, treat the patients, and unravel the mystery of the gruesome experiment.

name: Micro Craft 2: Survival
summary: The best free game with 3D blocks and pixel graphics!

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Special
Midnight Calling: Jeronimo - Collector's Edition
summary: The forest holds many secrets...

name: Micro Maniacs Racing
summary:
Micro Maniacs Racing is an unofficial sequel to the Micro Machines racing games and features a similar 3D perspective to the previous game, Micro Machines V3.

As with previous games, the racing environments are based in real-world locations such as kitchens, laboratories and gardens, played "zoomed in" due to the miniature nature of the racers

The 12 character choices (some of which are unlockable) are differentiated by various unique attack moves.

Instead of racing with vehicles, the Micro Maniacs race on foot.

name: MineSorter
summary: Put mines in the correct folder before they explode! Drag to select multiple mines for more score.

name: Mind Games
summary:
Mind games is a great set of extremely hard brain twisting puzzles!
Warning: this game is for smarties! Only one out of ten people can solve the first puzzle!

name: Midwinter Spirits
summary: As the days grow shorter & dark nights seem endless, you abide by the old winter superstitions & folklore, & keep the village fires burning to welcome back your ancestral spirits.

name: Mission: Mars
summary: Protect Mars from waves of enemies in "Mission: Mars." As Sergeant Eric, lead your team through 60 intense days of battle. Choose suits, upgrade weapons to ensure the survival of humanity's future on the Red Planet.

name: Mistery
summary: Made in bipsi game maker (bitsy clone) for a bitsy game jam with a theme "shipwreck". It's my first attempt to make a game in bitsy-like engine.

name: Micron Defense Force
summary: A Roguelike Tower Defense in space with missions to conquer. Can you hold against the spreading alien bosses? Build and upgrade towers against the corruption. Choose your technologies and warpspeed your way to victory.

name: Miuratale
summary: The small red-finned Miura, Keena, takes on the forces of corruption in the first mermaid RPG.

name: Mi ni Iku zo! Hedgehog
summary: Mi ni Ikuzo! Hedgehog is a Japanese fan game developed for X68000 computers in 1993 by Kiyoshi Sakai (co-creator of Umihara Kawase), and later ported to the PlayStation using the Net Yaroze development kit in 1997 by the same creator.

name: Microarcade ApplePie
summary:
Microarcade ApplePie is a set of 8 simple activities, where you're baking virtual pies step by step. From picking up the apples to keeping heat in the traditional East Slavic oven.

The Microarcade franchise intends providing simple, yet diverse activities to those longing for casual and hypercasual gaming. They’re fully suitable for kids.

name: Milosc
summary: miłość is a minimalist black & white framed game about friendship, love, self-exploration and existentialism. miłość is a unique blend of visual novels, JRPG’s and platforming beauty.

name: Mickey's House Party
summary: Mickey is preparing a big party and he needs your help! Help him prepare his house by completing seven fun mini games.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Augusta Airport (KAGS)
summary: The SIM720 Augusta Airport download has been created as a replica of the real world site. The package includes a wealth of custom created and placed objects and a high resolution ground polygon. In addition the precision placement of runways and taxiways and the custom night-lighting provide incredibly realistic take-off and landing experiences. The Augusta Airport download has been designed for high compatibility and includes photo real blending with Default, Orbx Global and MegaScenery Earth Georgia. It is also DX10 compatible.

name: MicroRC Simulation
summary: MicroRC Simulation is a driving simulator for radio-controlled toy cars.

name: Mission
summary: You are the Monster

name: Midnight Passions: Yakuza Rose
summary: As a young child, your brother was abducted by the yakuza. With nothing but the memory of a blue rose tattoo to guide you, life ever since has been an endless pursuit to see the two of you reunited. When this search lands you in a deadly yakuza trap, your survival suddenly depends on the whims of three handsome but very different underworld figures.

name: Miss Detective's Undercover
summary:
City's infamous gentleman of the night, Mystic Thief X!
And the detective who was stolen her first kiss!
Among the 3 suspects, who is the Mystic Thief who stole her first kiss?

name: Misako 37-sai: Doutei Daigakusei x Futsuu no Shufu
summary: A visual novel from α-MODEL.

name: Minigolf Party

name: Mini Legend

summary: This game has three erotic episodes and features multiple voice selection, a multitude of options and game path, animations and 4K renders.

summary:
Do you remember mini cars you played with your friends when you were child?
Very small, but very fast our mini car race.
The mini cars came back as game!

name: Miracle Casino Paradise
summary: Miracle Casino Paradise is a Miscellaneous game, published by Carrozzeria, which was released in Japan in 1995.

name: Midnight Terror: The Beginning
summary: Ethan, um agente da SWAT entra na prefeitura de uma cidade infestada de monstros com a missão de encontrar sobreviventes ao ataque de um vírus desconhecido. Jogo indie de Survivor Horror em 3ª Pessoa feito por uma única pessoa no motor gráfico Unreal Engine 4.

name: Mindmazer
summary: Only you can help Jimmy to remember the way back home. Remember the path in this game to reach the top!

name: Microcosmum: Survival of Cells - Campaign "Aliens"
summary: Additional campaign of 50 levels with new game content.

name: MiniMoni: Mika no Happy Morning Chatty
summary: MiniMoni: Mika no Happy Morning Chatty is a Strategy game, published by Shogakukan, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Missing Friend: Icky Mr Fox
summary: Come along with Mr. Rabbit on an adventure to rescue his dear friend from the mischievous Icky Mr. Fox in this interactive book app. Explore beautiful and interesting scenery, learn new vocabulary and interact with quirky characters.

name: Mix Ore
summary: A young man named Kantarou wakes up in a hospital bed with amnesia. He has no memory of what happened to him and is confronted by a mysterious girl who makes a claim about their "relationship". Who is this girl and why is she pretending to be someone she isn't?

name: Mini Wheels
summary: Mini Wheels is an arcade fantasy racing game with story mode and appealing graphics. Local and online multiplayer capacity, innovative racing power-ups and game modes.

name: Missing Bullet
summary: This is a first person action game,The player needs to survive as long as possible, the player has bow and arrow, shield, knife as weapons.,,Players are free to explore the surrounding area.Survive as long as possible!

name: Mirror Chains
summary: Novel match-3 gameplay + all kinds of beautiful girl characters = this game, you are welcome to challenge~

name: Minecraft: Steven Universe Mash-up
summary: Steven enters the Minecraft universe in this Diamond-worthy Mash-up! Contains Steven Universe-themed skins, textures, original music from the show, and all your favorite locations, from Beach City to Homeworld. Believe in Steven!

name: Microscopic Journey
summary: Travelling through the human blood system in your mini-sub you have to eliminate dangers to the human body on a microscopic scale.

name: Mind Reflection
summary:
The black mirror puzzle game with more than 100 levels.
Embody your MIND by creating your own reflection puzzles and test your skills by collecting by mastering even the hardest puzzles.

name: Michigan Cargo Campaign: Grand Transport Alliance
Mirror Maker
summary: The reason we made Mirror Maker is to give the players the freedom to create. Make your own version of Mirror and share it with the world.

name: Mighty Monkey
summary: This game is based on the ancient Chinese legend of "Monkey". The player scrolls through waves of enemies, avoiding rocks and platforms along the way.

name: Miriel Saga
summary: Evil creatures known as Dreadlings are fast approaching to threaten the world balance and mankind. In a world of might and magic, engulfed in conflict since centuries past, it’s your role to stand up for all, gather your allies and solve the remaining mysteries.

name: Millennium GamePak Gold
summary: Millennium GamePak Gold is a compilation game disc for Windows.

name: Millennium Gamepak Platinum
summary: Millennium Gamepak Platinum is a collection of casual games for Windows.

name: Mini Mini Farm
summary: In Mini Mini Farm you must collect resources in order to make your way through an inhospitable island, making money and building structures for your survival

name: Minesweeper Online
summary: Minesweeper Online is a web-browser game to play the classic Minesweeper game across multiple disciplines such as time, no flag, efficiency and more! Players can compete in arenas, events, and monthly championships alongside the rest of the Minesweeper community.

name: Micro Maze
summary: Grab all chees in the maze before the cat catches you.

name: Mixtape Fever
summary: Fast-Paced local PvP

name: Miracle Girls Festival
summary: Miracle Girls Festival is an upcoming Japanese rhytm dancing game akin to the Project Diva series. It features characters and songs from various anime series.

name: Mini-Yonku Let's & Go!! Power WGP 2
summary: Mini-Yonku Let's & Go!! Power WGP 2 is a Racing game, developed by Jupiter Multimedia and published by Nintendo, which was released in Japan in 1998.

name: Midway Arcade Treasures 3
summary: Midway Arcade Treasures 3 is a compilation of arcade and racing games for the PlayStation 2, Xbox and Nintendo GameCube. It is the third and final installment following Midway Arcade Treasures and Midway Arcade Treasures 2. Like the first and second installments, however, Midway Arcade Treasures 3 is not compatible with an Xbox 360

name: Miyasu Nonki no Quiz 18-kin
summary: A Japanese quiz game where if you answer correctly women take off their clothes.

name: Mini Transport
summary: In MiniTransport, players need to think about how to use wiring to build a complete industrial chain to achieve the goal of producing the final product.

name: Miskatonic
summary: Miskatonic is a fantastical VR shooter game. The game will transport the player visually, as well as through their senses, while also navigating a meaningful narrative of the magical world of Miskatonic University.

name: Minami no Shima ni Buta Ga Ita
summary: Strange saturn game with a pig character.

name: Mind Rite
summary: Aina is a young investigator in a distant city in the north, but when mysterious magical murders begin to take place in it, it is she and her partner who are entrusted with the case. But what if everything is not what it seems? What if Aina itself become a victim?

name: Mind Shadows
summary: Mind Shadows is the first standalone game that my friend and I have made since graduating. It is a short psychological horror experience set in the 1980s. You will see multiple cinematic locations in First Person as you slowly gather hints to what is going on.

name: Microsurgeon
summary:
You're a microsurgeon, and your patient is in critical condition! First you need to examine the patient's medical chart to find out what's wrong, and which conditions are the most critical. Now to save the patient, you control a robot probe which can be used to administer aspirin, antiseptic, or ultrasonics to clear up the problem. You should clear up the most critical conditions first, then move on to the less serious areas to ensure your patient survives. Your probe should navigate through the veins, arteries, and lymph; if you guide the probe outside these areas, it's movement will slow down and swarms of white blood cells will attack it, depleting the limited energy supply. There are 197 different patients you need to help, each with different ailments.

Microsurgeon was among 240 video games selected to be included in "The Art of Video Games" exhibit at the Smithsonian Institution in 2012.

name: Miss Neko: Pirates
summary: Pirates ahead! The pirate girls on Skull Island have yet to witness the true extent of your prowess, Captain. Can you conquer them one by one with your skills and plunder that precious treasure onto your ship?

name: MiniChef
summary: Take control of a MiniChef in this match-3 game, picking up oversized food one-by-one and organizing it to create recipes and prove that size doesn't matter!

name: Might and Magic: Book One - The Secret of the Inner Sanctum
summary: Feel the power... Experience the magic! Lead your party of hand-picked adventurers into the enchanted Land of Varn. From dark, moldy caverns through corridors of majestic castles, you'll travel in search of clues to unlock the Secret of the Inner Sanctum. Daring exploits of heroism and sorcery will keep you riveted for hours. Choose from a variety of extraordinary personalities and lead them on an adventure of a lifetime. Over 250 weapons and items and more than 92 mystical spells to use in your search for the Inner Sanctum. Battle legions of ravenous monsters as you travel through forests and islands shrouded in mystery.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator 4.0: Aircraft & Scenery Designer
summary: This addon allows to personalise your flying experience with scenery you create. Also includes four new planes - a Boeing 747-400, Piper Archer, Beechcraft Starship, and seaplane.

name: Mind Control
summary: You have to destroy Zyco, an alien who is ruling Earth.

name: Milkcraft
summary: Milkcraft is a multiplayer RPG social sandbox game. In this mysterious world of Norse mythology, you can freely build your own territory and village, or start a survival adventure to challenge the dark dragon. Come with Us!

name: Miss Peach World
summary: This reskinned version of Menace Beach makes several changes to the original game. It replaces the original male protagonist with a female skateboarder and adds new background music between levels.

name: Milf Dream
summary: Do you want to hook up the hottest moms? We got you covered, mild lovers!

name: Mission Sigma
summary:
Secret services have located and neutralized a known terrorist who has been hiding out in a deprived area of the city for the last ten years. This is where the good news ends. It turns out that on the roof of an abandoned high-rise the maniac has installed a nuclear warhead with a timer on it.

The building itself has been turned into a tower filled with intricate traps and obstacles. You have been recommended as a specialist in such puzzles, and the secret service has helped you infiltrate the courtyard. The rest is down to you.

Can you get past all the traps and preempt a nuclear attack?

name: Midnight Collection
summary: ~ Midnight Deluxe + Birthday of Midnight ~

name: M.I.S.V VR
summary: M.I.S.V is a SCP INSPIRED Organisation that works under the Radar as a Cleaner and Capture Unit for Anamolic Creatures. Play alone or with 3 Friends against terrifying Creatures controlled by a Player or AI, or fight against other players in a competitive 5vs5 Match in different Modes.

name: Micro Commandos
summary: Micro Commandos is a real time strategy game where you control tiny aliens from another planet look for a so called "Ultimate Weapon". Lead your aliens through 14 missions in the world of the big people. Explore unusual settings like a museum, subway, pizzeria....Collect resourse's of food and material to feed and construct vehicles and buildings for your aliens. Fight off another alien race looking for the Ultimate Weapon as well as bugs hamsters and the family cat.

name: Micro Machines 1 and 2: Twin Turbo
summary: This game gives new meaning to the phrase "Take two, they're small." Micro Machines 1 & 2: Twin Turbo literally gives you two games on one cartridge. This is an unconventional arcade-style racer where the tiny vehicles are seen from a top-down perspective. There are no pit stops to plan for, nor is there oil pressure for you to worry about--just motorized mayhem on a miniature scale. Identical in gameplay, each game in Micro Machines 1 & 2: Twin Turbo offers 24 unique tracks that, from your microperspective, seem enormous! You'll race around gigantic breakfast tables, bathtubs, desks, and gardens. With simple gameplay and quirky, colorful graphics, this game should appeal to gamers of all ages.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Platinum Edition
Missile Collector Man
summary: Play game. Solve puzzle. Collect missile.

name: Mimpi Dreams: Mars DLC
summary: What would be the night sky without shining stars? Mimpi explores the famous Red Planet and investigates the mystery of their disappearance. This new level is almost as large as all previous levels together.

name: Mizuki Shigeru no Yokai Shashinkan
summary: Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Shashinkan is a Strategy game, developed by Ukiyotei and published by SNK, which was released in Japan in 1999

name: Mimsy & Friends!
summary: Bring your girlfriend a cake!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X
summary:
Microsoft Flight Simulator X is the culmination of nearly 25 years of the landmark Flight Simulator franchise—the most significant addition to date.

Flight Simulator X immerses you in a beautifully rich and realistic world with dozens of aircraft and interactive Missions for a completely new and innovative gaming experience. Free Flight lets you fly anywhere in the world, from your hometown airport to the most exotic places you’ve ever dreamed of.

Gamers and simmers of all ages and skill levels feel firsthand what it’s like to be an aviator traveling the globe solo or online with others.

name: Missing Parts 3: The Tantei Stories
summary: The third entry in the "Missing Parts" series by F.O.G. and the last one to be released on the Dreamcast.

name: Mister Mart
summary: Punch Customers! Return Items! Get High Scores! Enter the world of Mister Mart, and enjoy this cathartic experience of working customer service with no worry about getting fired.

name: Mirastell
summary: Mirastell is a 2D adventure game with a unique flavor of turn-based combat, set on a mysterious, abandoned space cruise liner. Discover what lead to the fate of the passengers, and earn weapons and items by exploring, and defeating enemies.

name: Mister Burnhouse
summary: Mister Burnhouse is a real gangster quest with drawn graphics and colorful characters. Many interesting situations and puzzles with a slight flavor of madness!

name: Mille Bornes
summary:
Hop in your car and hit the road! The goal in this classic card game is simple: be the first to reach 1000 miles! Play with up to three friends on the same device, or test your driving skill against the AI! Who will be the best behind the wheel?
Draw cards and use them to jump miles ahead of your opponents. But you also have to be careful, because your friends may well not just let you drive in peace: flat tires, accidents or simply running out of gas are some of the complications you might encounter on your journey.

name: Mister Mosquito
summary:
Experience Mister Mosquito originally released on the PlayStation2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

You are Mister Mosquito, an uninvited guest in the Yamada’s family home. You will need to drink as much of their blood as possible to survive the winter. They know you are in the house, and they plan to take you out.

name: Miss Spider: Harvest Time - Hop and Fly
summary: "Miss Spider: Harvest Time - Hop and Fly" was especially developed for a younger audience to take full advantage of the special capabilities of the Nintendo DS system including the touch screen and the microphone. It contains a wide variety of different game play situations, spread over more than two dozen stages.

name: Milf Toys
summary: Hentai is not just 2D girls, this is a whole art. And in this art units understand.

name: Minna no Tetris
summary: Minna no Tetris is a handheld plug-and-play TV game developed and published by EPOCH in Japan.

name: Mid or Feed
summary: Simulator of life of cyberathlete, going to his main goal - win on TI. Along the way, you will have to face a lot of challenges for the sake of victory, becoming not only a star of eSports, but also an integral part of the most brutal gaming community.

name: Minecraft: Gear VR Edition
summary: Minecraft: Gear VR Edition was the former title of the version of Bedrock Edition designed for virtual reality on certain Samsung Galaxy devices through the Samsung Gear VR headset. It was released on April 27, 2016. Although Pocket Edition on the Samsung Galaxy Apps store was discontinued later on, Gear VR Edition was never made free to owners of Pocket Edition on that platform.

name: Minimalist Sudoku
summary: A customizable Sudoku game that allows you to enjoy the joy of solving puzzles alone, as well as the fun of collaborating with others.

name: Minna no! Shougakusei aru aru Sagashi: Kokomo mo Otona mo Tanoshimeru Irasuto Quiz no Tore Game
Misuto
summary: Hip Hop Samurai Action with stylish combat and relaxing environments. A wandering samurai gets lost in a mist, but it's not as simple as it looks at first glance. Can you find the way out?

name: Mission Against Terror 2
summary: Mission Against Terror 2 offers what none other MMOFPS has to offer and on top of that, its casual! Customize your avatar and battle with it in style. There are hundreds of different costumes to choose from, along with different accessories to enhance your looks. The only limit is your imagination!

name: Missman
summary: A 2D platformer where a secret agent uses a pistol to propel through obstacles and reach the target.

name: Micro Stunt Machina
summary: Micro Stunt Machina is a casual game perfect mix of puzzle and arcade. On 80 Levels, get your micro-cars to the finish line going through obstacles over micro-tracks.

name: Mion and the Cursed Killer Hamster
summary: The Magnificent Mion is a warrior queen from Wharevarland. She battles a malignant verse-making kraken, tries to win the love of Count De Loboda, studies at an ordinary magical school, and she's also... crazy! Absurdism. Ridiculousness. Idiocy.

name: Mixed Matrix Slingo
summary: Mixed Matrix Slingo is one of the many Bing games that uses your Xbox Live account for leaderboard information.

name: Mine Sweeper
summary: Have you ever wanted to play the Windows time waster on your old Atari 2600? Well now you can!

name: Miya
summary: The stunning warrior maiden gracefully dances through the battlefield, slicing through demons with her blade, collecting resources, unlocking stunning outfits, and embracing the ultimate thrill of action!

name: Mini-Putt
summary: Mini Putt is a miniature golf game that offers 4 courses, Deluxe, Classic, Traditional and Challenge. Up to 4 players can either play a game or practice any hole on any course. Each course offers its own difficulty level. Deluxe and Challenge have difficult hills and course layouts. The Challenge being the more difficult course. The Classic offers animated bridges and other obstacles. The traditional is your standard miniature golf course which requires well placed bank shots.

name: MIA Online
summary: MIA Online was a mobile free-to-play fantasy MMORPG. Its official server was closed on March 2020.

name: Midori no Kaori
summary: Welcome to Midori no Kaori, a relaxing cozy game that allows you to create your own Japanese shop and manage customers. There are no winners or losers here, just unleash your creativity and enjoy a unique experience.

name: Mind Your Language: Learn English
summary:
"Mind Your Language" makes learning fun and takes the chore out of studying. Targeted for the ages of 8-15, it is the first language game made for younger audiences as well as other generations. 
 
By using mini games to teach Vocabulary and Grammar, Players gain a knowledge of a foreign language without even realising they are learning.

name: Microgue
summary:
Climb a dark tower in this Micro sized Rogue-like that focuses more on
character movement, than stats and gear.
Can you retrieve the treasure and escape the dragon’s wrath?

name: MiniLife: Tournament
summary: Build your village under a hail of gunpowder barrels and bombs. Collect resources and defend against enemy sieges. Destroy enemy fortifications with combat llamas and mega mechs. MiniLife: Tournament is a cooperative game where only teamwork leads to victory!

name: Minecraft: 1st Animal Friends Skin Pack
summary: The "1st Animal Friends" Skin Pack will charm you with its warm appeal. Using a rustic wardrobe and farm-themed accessories, you may create a character in a world full of charming farm animals and hardworking farmers.

name: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles
summary: Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles - Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. Middle Ages Jigsaw Puzzles is designed for adults.

name: Mini Island
summary: Mini Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Mia's Christmas
summary: Join Mia this Christmas as she prepares to decorate her flat in this deceptively simple yet increasingly difficult puzzle game.

name: Mini Racers
summary: Mini Racers is a Driving game, developed and published by Looking Glass Studios, which was cancelled before it was released.

name: Milf City
summary: Milf City is a modern city where many races, cultures and lives of ordinary people are intertwined. And today you will be able to get to know more closely the life of 5 beautiful girls, residents of this city, who are radically different in their lifestyles and characters.

name: Midnight Heaven
summary: Survive a midnight duty on mars by fighting off invading native creatures. Midnight Heaven is a hack N slash roguelike with randomly generated arena. Choose from variety of avatar and weapon and make your own builld to survive.

name: Millennium Mission
summary: Ship shooting game that was on some nokia 2600 cell phones

name: Midautumn
summary: Crashing at Grandma's was meant to be a break from your responsibilities. But relaxing might prove hard when the Spirit World is real, its entrance is in your basement, and you're its newest guardian. Blast evil spirits and save your hometown in this rogue-like dungeon crawler!

name: Mini Football
summary: Put on your boots and get ready to go onto the pitch in this brand-new football game! Experience football like never before in this fresh and easy-to-play football game. In Mini Football, you will enjoy a casual gameplay experience, while still remaining loyal to the original game. Calling all strikers, midfielders, defenders, and goalies: get ready for kickoff! It’s time for you to get the crowds roaring in the stadiums, score some amazing screamers, and build the strongest team that ever existed! Score a goal in this fun, intuitive football game!

name: Minecraft, But If You Touch Grass You Die
summary: Minecraft, but if you touch grass you die is a challenge mod for Minecraft based on the traditional children's game the floor is lava, in which the grass block deals damage to the player.

name: Mighty Mighty Missile!
summary: Mighty Mighty Missile! for the Sega Mega-CD is an unlicensed clone of ChuChu Rocket!, which was originally released on the Sega Dreamcast. The game closely mimics the presentation and gameplay of Sonic Team's earlier releases, including stages adapted from both the Dreamcast and Game Boy Advance versions.

name: MindGym
summary: MindGym is a surreal game about creative thinking.

name: Mind, Body & Soul: Nutrition Matters
summary: Discover just how healthy you really are? Nutrition Matters is perfect if you're looking for a fun way to maintain a healthy balance between diet and exercise in the comfort of your living room. In fact, you can combine nutrition matters with your fitness game of choice for all round well-being. Use your Wii as your personal nutrition monitor to easily track your calories and measure them against daily activities in order to reach your personal fitness goals.

name: Minos
summary:
Minos is a puzzle game where you try to fill a grid with the pieces available.
Play 60 uniquely designed levels and keep the fun going with endless generated levels.
Try to visualize how to fill the patterns to complete the levels.

name: Minion Kart Multiplayer Racing
summary: Race against other players online via the multiplayer racing games mode, or play a single player game modes! See if you can climb to the top of the leaderboards.

name: Mini Golf Worlds VR
summary: Golf through immersive worlds ranging from the depths of the sea to the far reaches of outer space. Customize your appearance, and show off your golfing skills online with up to 8 people.

name: Minigolf VR
summary: Minigolf VR is a multiplayer social minigolf game for the HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Oculus Touch. Play with friends, and experience a social gaming like never before!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Dangerous Approaches
summary: Dangerous Approaches is a mission pack consisting of 20 of the most nail-biting approaches in modern aviation. Following routes flown by real-world pilots, accuracy in speed and direction is of the essence.

name: Miriam: The Escape
summary: In Miriam you will go on an adventure inside a girl's strange dreams. Stages of black and white, light and silhouette are waiting to be challenged by you. Are you ready to solve the puzzles and escape from the endless lucid dreams?

name: Minecraft: Wii U Edition
summary: Minecraft is a game about placing blocks and going on adventures.

name: Midnight at the Celestial Palace: Chapter I
summary: Midnight at the Celestial Palace: Chapter I is the first episode in an all new fantasy adventure series by Orrery Games and BlipHaus Design.

name: Migawari Shoujo
summary: Hitomi is a little girl who discovers that one of her relatives choose to make her a sacrifice to die in her place. A shinigami decides give Hitomi a chance at life. To save herself, she must discover who is the person who wanted to sacrifice her and the one who was really destined to die.

name: Mighty Match Puzzle Adventure
summary:
You are Chouchou, heir of the Sacred Rooster Dynasty. Your quest is to travel across the Holy Mountain and free the Sacred Animals from the dark spell cast upon them by the mysterious Evil Master. To achieve your goal, you will have to gain experience and unlock the best weapons, by finishing as many objectives as possible.
But victory won’t come so easily! You will need courage and dexterity to align resources on your path, granting you more strength, defense and magic.

name: MicroSoccer
summary: MicroSoccer is a fun and challenging retro style football game.

name: Miira
summary: A gameplay-focused puzzle-horror mashup. Escape the nightmarish mazes of your own psyche by hiding, running, and solving puzzles.

name: Mira's Workshop
summary: Learn how to make a masterpiece from scrap materials! Mira's Workshop - Uncover hidden pictures!

name: Mimelet
summary: Travel with Mimelet through a wonderful adventure! Jump on top of enemies to steal their powers and overcome any obstacles along the way. Mimelet is a wholesome platform adventure game featuring a simple and fun game mechanic and challenging puzzles.

name: Miami Shark
summary: Take a wild ride through the action packed daily routine of a Miami Shark, the destruction and mayhem is bound to rip your face off right through the screen. Intense shark-tion includes intense explosions, mass genocide of innocents and adrenaline pumping insanity.

name: Mission: It's Complicated
summary: Mission: It’s Complicated is a narrative-based, visual novel where you match super-awesome superheroes to go on missions during the night and dates during the day. The more compatible the pair of superheroes are, the more likely that they will fall in love and save the world.

name: Michiko Jump!
summary:
Leap off of a seesaw!

Japan exclusive; available for a limited time.

name: Micro Battles 3
summary:
Whoop your friends in head to head battles, 8-bit style!
Picking up where the glorious 2-player based video games of the 1970-1980s left off, it's time to bring back snakes, cars, robots and samurais to once again settle the score between players.

name: Mithra Dream Battle
summary: Mithra Dream Battle is a VMU game released with Godzilla Generations.
platforms: Visual Memory Unit / Visual Memory System

name: Milk and Cookies
summary: An adorable physics puzzle game about reuniting Milk and Cookies!

name: Midnight's Blessing 2
summary: A mysterious force targets Sidni, and she must flee to keep her home and friends safe! Sidni finds herself in a strange land that holds the keys to her past. On her adventure, she meets new friends and discovers a bizarre army, which is amassing to sweep the world, with herself as its primary target!

name: Minigolf Maniacs
summary: Miniature golf is a crazy sport as it is, but Minigolf Maniacs takes the unpredictable nature of the popular pastime to new heights. There are still the standard windmill holes, castles, and the like, but the game really goes nuts by adding in touches like fire-breathing dragons, ill-willed flower patches, and dozens of hidden obstacles. Add to all of that the fact that there's a pack of mischief-making kids running around terrorizing the golfers, and you've got yourself one tense gaming experience. You choose between eight playable characters each of whom happens to be a representative of a species from the wild and make your way through 40 wacky holes. There are eight different game types to shake things up a bit, and four hidden boss characters to ensure that your game won't be easy. All of the graphics are 3D, and the game is packed with shortcuts, power-ups, and lots of other unexpected madness.

name: Missing
summary:
Receive actual e-mail from virtual characters and The Phoenix himself, use these email and other evidence as clues, to put together the pieces of the puzzle.
Visit all kinds of Websites within the game to collect information and solve the case.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Amazing Edition
Minna to Capcom All-Stars
summary: GREE crossover game

name: Mimetic Love
summary: Three men and one destiny. What will happen? Difficulties and overcoming. Get ready to live this adventure. Nothing will be as it once was. Everything has its time... And here will not be the exception... Love, jealousy, resentment and forgiveness.

name: Mirror Broken
summary: Solve the sleeping puzzle to get the beauties' hearts

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - FS Academy: On Instruments
summary: Developed by a real commercial pilot, FS Academy: On Instruments combines video tuition, flight briefings, approach charts and FSX missions into a full training package for the sim pilot that wants to take their experience to the next level.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Embraer E-Jets 175 & 195
summary: The Embraer 175/195 aircraft are domestic range airliners with state-of-the-art avionics, fly-by-wire technology, superior cabin comfort and uncompromising performance. These regional jets are perfect for short haul flights while experiencing the excitement of taking off and landing in major airports.

name: MiniRacingOnline
summary: MiniRacingOnline is a multiplayer racing game in which you will be able to compete with players of any part of the world.

name: Miracle Sweeper
summary: A casual mini puzzle game! Please kill time!

name: Microscopic
summary: In the year 2066, mankind has finally achieved the pinnacle in medical discovery with the massive deployment of nanotechnology. Play as Venture, a new nanobot in this top down atmospheric adventure game to seek out what went wrong in the medical disaster.

name: Miao and the Friendmily Journal: Miao
summary: A Miao journal about the main character

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Treasure Hunt
summary: Step back in time to the golden age of the classic adventure serial, and join archaeologist/adventurer Rick Rider as he searches the globe for the lost Treasure of Patit. Treasure Hunt features a custom liveried Grumman Goose, an amphibious aircraft, which is included in Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition.

name: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack
summary: Minecraft: The Simpsons Skin Pack is a skin pack for Minecraft which contains 24 Simpsons-themed skins, released on February 27, 2015 and was delisted on May 30, 2017.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - HD Airport Graphics
summary: Give your favourite default Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition airport a makeover with Zinertek’s HD Airport Graphics! Useable on all 24,000 default airports in Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition, this package includes over 400 textures that add detail and realism to airports around the world.

name: Mini Game Compil 3
summary: Mini Game Compil 3 is a compilation of 16 mini games inspired by Nintendo licenses for the most part, and some others that aren't Nintendo's.

name: Mihomi Dream
summary:
“This is the venomous cry of a person defeated by life.”

A novel containing two stories, Mihomi and her brother's point of views.

A fandisc for Menherafflesia.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Accu-Feel
summary: Add a touch of Accu-Sim to your Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition fleet! Accu-Feel enables you to customize numerous aspects of your aircraft’s behavior, from the level of turbulence and drag rumble experienced in different flying conditions to the amount of tyre screech on touchdown.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Caernarfon Airport (EGCK)
summary: The SIM720 Caernarfon Airport download has been created as a replica of the real world site. It features high quality bespoke models, custom photo-real textures and hand placement of buildings. The Caernarfon Airport buildings have each been faithfully recreated, including the Aviation Museum visitor centre and shop, the café, wind turbines and the hangars.

name: Miniature Air Hockey
summary: Arcade style Air Hockey, play normal mode and learn the basics, then step up to the extreme level!

name: Mirrored Soul
summary: A turn-based RPG detective story with focus on monster-collecting, exploration, and humor. Negotiate with enemies to recruit them to your party, and fuse your monsters to create new ones.

name: Mini Star Fishing
summary: Have a relaxing time catching cute and colorful fish with fully controllable fishing rod. Upgrade your character and buy better boats. Buy a spaceship and head into space to fishing in space. Or, buy a submarine and go fishing in the deep sea. And fill the fish DEX.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Moving Map
summary: Take control of your world with Moving Map! Developed by FS-FlightControl, Moving Map gives you a better handle on the big picture: it will follow your aircraft regardless of where it is in the sim, and will provides you with detailed information on airport layouts, navaids, and more.

name: Missing: Game for a Cause
summary: An experiential quest game allowing the player to get into the shoes of a missing girl

name: Microsoft Train Simulator: German Railroads Volume One: The Seventies - Along the Bigge Lake
summary:
German Railroads Volume One is an add-on for Microsoft Train Simulator which adds tracks and landscape along the German Finnentrop-Olpe-Betzdorf and Olpe-Diering-hausen lines in the 1970s. The Deutsche Bundesbahn rail line, which operate in this area are represented, and this add-on carries their license. This add-on adds approximately 100km of secondary line to travel on.

This package includes 48 new freight cars, 9 passenger cars as well as 6 engines: the BR 211, the BR 212, 3 versions of BR 323 and BR 217, as well as 2 drivable railcars: The BR 795 and the BR 798.

name: Mitsumete Knight R: Daibouken-hen
summary: The sequel to the dating simulation Mitsumete Knight, features a 2d isometric view RPG game and has some characters from the first game.

name: Mini Scientist
summary: The mini scientist needs an engine for his rocket to get to the space. Use your mouse to point and click causing a chain of actions and reactions that will unlock each mini level.

name: Mickey & Friends
summary: A port of Mickey and Friends in the wristwatch format.

name: Mighty Vikings
summary: You have to take on the role of Captain Bjorn and go on an adventure and clear the land of evil spirits.

name: Mirrorama
summary: A unique puzzle game with an interesting story. Witness the story of Josh Lattey while solving mind boggling puzzles using mirrors and reflections. Mirrorama offers an exceptional experience for puzzle game lovers.

name: Midnight Magic
summary: Midnight Magic utilized the Atari 2600 joystick for performing simulated pinball functions, such as activating the flippers and shooting the ball. Moving the joystick controller down pulls the pinball machine plunger back while pressing the joystick button shoots the ball into the playfield. The left and right flippers are activated by moving the joystick controller left or right. Hitting all five drop targets at the top of the table increases the bonus multiplier (2x, 3x, and so on). Extra balls can be earned when hitting the rollover targets at the top left and right corners of the table when the bonus multiplier is activated.

name: Mimic Hunters
summary: Mimic Hunters - is a game in which you have to become an mimic or a hunter.An exciting game for a company of friends and new acquaintances.

name: Mine Shaft
summary: Mine Shaft is a homebrew platformer for the NES.

name: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator
summary: Military Enlistment Office Escape Simulator is a game that requires you to do everything you can to escape from those who are knocking on the door at the most inconvenient moment! Starring Vovochka, who suddenly knocked on the door. Open the door or not, the choice is yours!

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Skychaser
summary: Skychaser features an exclusive Extra 330SC stunt aircraft, accurately modelled down to the finest details, including a fully functional cockpit with authentic audio captured from a real-life engine.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
summary: Includes 16 new puzzles, each featuring stunning images of the Milky Way and its celestial wonders. A perfect addition for astronomy enthusiasts and puzzle lovers looking to expand their cosmic journey.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Manhattan X
summary: Manhattan X provides the ultimate Big Apple experience for helicopter and general aviation enthusiasts. Fly amongst New York’s most iconic buildings, practice your landing skills on four heliports, and put your skills to the test in the Manhattan helicopter tour mission.

name: MiniPix Jump
summary:
Prevent your character from falling and go as high as possible in this fun, easy to handle and very, very addictive game.
 Unlock more than a hundred characters! Don’t forget to collect coins and take care of the obstacles that will be on your way...

name: Minna no Mona Mona 1
summary: The first of three games that contain all the maps of Monarch Monarch with a rebalanced difficulty.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Flight Tales II: Adrenaline
summary: Feel your adrenaline pumping in flight situations you've never seen before!

name: Mineirinho Shooter DC
summary: Miner is back and he called his very beautiful friend Lil' Pauline (Paulistinha) to enjoy a new adventures , they need to overcome the threat of space gluttons!!! Very cool and fun physical shooter style game, a unique game mechanic experience!!!

name: Million Hits
summary: 'Million Hits' contains a whopping 100 songs, widely ranging from J-Pop to Enka! With iconic hits, you can play all your favorite songs. This game also adds the latest hits and popular songs every month, so even the heaviest music nerd can enjoy these songs with ease. Player requests can be added to the game, and the most requested songs at the end of the week and month respectively will be added to the game! You can also jam with another player, alternating or harmonizing for a karaoke-like experience!

name: MistsBook
summary: "MistsBook" is a deck-building roguelite game where automatic chain reactions form the core gameplay. where you can play all the cards you draw with just one button press. You will collect patterns, symbols, and seals to uncover clues and reveal the pages of this book that has no beginning or end.

name: Missing Blue
summary: Missing Blue is a visual novel for PlayStation 2.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Beechcraft T-34B Mentor
summary: Carenado’s T-34B Mentor for FSX: Steam Edition is a detailed rendition of this aircraft which comes with three paint schemes. Details include pitot pressure chamber, antennas, chocks, and pitot tube cover.

name: Minesweeper Materialized
summary: Minesweeper for Android Devices in Material Design

name: Miniature Land: Four Seasons
summary: An escape room game made by hand-building and photographing miniature scenes. Explore a miniature world in live-action and enjoy feeling like you're really there.

name: MiG Alley
summary: MiG Alley is a combat flight simulation set in Northwestern Korea, specifically in MiG Alley.

name: Microgame Mosaic
summary: The theme is "Art". Controls: Arrow keys to move around, z and x to interact in a game.

name: Missile Command
summary: A LCD handheld port of Missile Command.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - US Cities X: Chicago
summary: Welcome to Chicago! US Cities X: Chicago for FSX: Steam Edition brings you the famed Windy City in high detail – it even includes a glimpse of the future as you are able to see the Chicago Spire, a skyscraper currently in development!

name: Minigame Party VR
summary: Minigame Party VR is a combination of 4 hilarious and entertaining minigames. Throw basketballs, shoot with laser guns, and slash through targets in order to gain a higher score against your friends!

name: Mind War
summary: Mind War "is a role-playing game with national warfare gameplay. Players will play the role of wandering between countries to achieve success, with detailed game graphics, cool skill effects, and exciting battle scenes, creating a grand battlefield between countries for you.

name: Mike & Tyler
summary: Mike & Tyler is a point & click adventure game, full of puzzles, mystery and dangerous characters.

name: Mio Garden
summary: Take a break from reality. Mio Garden offers up a calming Virtual Reality experience unlike any other. Interact with a series of mini games or sit down, relax and meditate against the backdrop of a never-ending sunset.

name: Miraculo Island
summary: What you thought would be eight boring days in a remote island will become your worst nightmares. Is the place haunted? Is someone else out there to get us? Is there another motive they brought us here? Depends on you and your mates to survive in this mysterious place.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Toposim North Africa
summary: Toposim North Africa for FSX: Steam Edition provides multi-LOD 7-11, 19m maximum terrain mesh for the whole North African region, improving the accuracy of the default terrain mesh and offering a marked improvement to the landscape profile.

name: Mighty Flip Champs!
summary: Mighty Flip Champs! is a puzzle/platform game hybrid, requiring players to explore stages that vary from having two areas to up to eight areas. The objective is to get the player-character, Alta, through the stage and to find the Fishman.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cessna 152
summary: The C152 is a two-seater, piston-engine aircraft equipped with a fixed tricycle landing gear, 110hp four-cylinder engine and fixed-pitch propeller – an ideal aircraft for touring and flight training.

name: Mission: Escape
summary: When I opened my eyes, I stand in a strange place. My last memory is of losing consciousness while preparing for a mission. I don't know where we are, but we have a gun, so let's move. I'm sure I can go back. You become the main character and must rely on one gun to get out of this place.

name: MiniCar Race
summary:
Little Cars, BIG Fun! Start your engines! The most vibrant, super racing game you’ve ever seen is here! 
Unlock all kinds of fun cars! Challenge multiple race tracks, multiple racing modes!

name: Mix the Forgotten
summary: A narrative puzzle crafting adventure set in a world where everyone and everything is something. Through Mix the Forgotten's surreal adventure you'll befriend everyone you can with the power of crafting and help them find meaning and move on to an unknown destination.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Pilatus PC-9/A
summary: Developed by IRIS from the Royal Australian Air Force’s PC-9/A pilot manual, the Pilatus PC-9/A for FSX: Steam Edition offers a wealth of realistic detail along with accurate flight dynamics and systems operation.

name: Misfiction
summary: A short horror parody game that takes a quip at a common BL trope

name: Miss Bingo
summary:
Miss Bingo is a clone of Min's previous game "Miss Puzzle" with updated graphics and a split screen for optional two player play.

The player must slide three or more matching tiles together in horizontal, vertical, or diagonal chains to clear them from the screen. When tiles are removed from the screen surrounding tiles drop and slide around to fill the gaps. Additional tiles are added to the screen over time and The objective is to clear a set number of chains before the tiles stack up and reach the dead line at the top of the play area.

Once the set number of tiles are removed, the play area is cleared and the photographic nude background image is revealed.

Clearing tiles advances a bar at the bottom of the screen. Once the bar is filled the game is interrupted by a bonus game. Once the bonus game is completed the game returns to the exact spot where it had left off.

If any tiles cross the dead line then the game is over. Upon continuing, the game removes the bottom few rows of tiles from the board so that gameplay can continue.

name: Millennium 3: Cry Wolf
summary: Time is running out for Marine and her friends. She needs to find warriors at all costs, but all she seems to stumble into is a mermaid, a werewolf, a dragon and hordes of crazy orcs... can you get her out of trouble, in one of the best episodes of the award-winning Millennium series?

name: MiniMoni: Onegaio Hoshisama!
summary: MiniMoni: Onegaio Hoshisama! is a Miscellaneous game, published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Missile Command
summary: Atari 5200 port of Missile Command.

name: Mizu
summary:
Mizu is a Yume Nikki Fangame that's (quite loosely) based on ancient and almost biblical times. Play as a middle-aged man named Isaac as he finds effects (called Tides here) and explores the world hidden in the statue while trapped in a hut on a deserted island.

Initially made for the 1st 1-week Yume Nikki Fangame Jam.

name: Mini Aliens
summary: Help the small aliens survive through multiple levels and waves of dangerous everyday objects that are looking to destroy them.

name: Ming's Challenge
summary: Sci-fi shooter for the Apple II.

name: Minecraft: Fantastic Fairgrounds
summary: Discover how to and unlock the power of AI through a wondrous world! Practice the skills to understand, evaluate, and utilize this exciting technology. Shape the future with AI literacy!

name: Michihaku Lucient 2: Itsuka, Kimi ga Otona ni Natte mo
MiniJolt
summary: Play through 11 unique minigames made by members of the Game Jolt community! Can you beat them all?

name: MicroMan
summary: It is not easy to be equal in height to an ant, isn’t it? The world of yours changes drastically after you accidentally fall into the reduction capsule. Fight for your life against scary spiders, frogs or rats! Try to survive in the urban jungle. Find a way to return to your original height!

name: Milky Bear Rescue Rocket
summary: In this interactive arcade game suitable for the little ones and older kids alike, help Milky Bear rescue small creatures from an army of mechanical thugs. The player can also play and learn fun facts and math facts in this game that is similar to Donkey Kong/Space Invaders!

name: Micro Olympics
summary:
Will you be the champion of Micro-Olympics?
Shoot your plane as far as you can.
Buy and carefully use power-ups on your way to the top.
Try to beat all 7 glorious pilots in this fast paced game…

name: Minecraft: Chinese Mythology Mash-up
summary: Journey through epic terrain and find enlightenment in this mythical Mash-up!

name: Microsoft Golf 1998 Edition
summary: Up to four virtual golfers can play on a choice of four lavish 18-hole golf courses around the world. The backgrounds and players are photo-realistic and the game features many sound effects and voice options.

name: Minion Forest
summary:
Protect the beautiful Mirika Forest with the lovely Minions! 
Alice, the forest fairy, calls us for the battle to protect the legendary forest! 
Awaken the dragon to stop the evil Moonies and the Bloody Queen and help us bring back Mirica forest!

name: Minecraft: Mini Game Heroes Skin Pack
Minecraft: Camp Enderwood
summary: Welcome to Camp Enderwood, the island summer camp of your dreams...and your nightmares! Participate in parkour, archery, hide n' hunt and more to earn marshmallows and roast the elusive s'more. Beware the spooky woods and creatures in the dark as you explore and venture beyond the camp.

name: Milkyway Funland
summary: Milkyway Funland is a collection of stunning, exciting, and fun VR games and experiences. The game takes you to the galaxy’s best amusement park in the 31st century. In this space station, everyone can try and experience incredible and impossible things from the past, present, and future.

name: Minky
summary: Minky is a classic platformer/ Jump & Run in retro look. Help Minky on it's journey through 28 varied Levels. Collect all available coins and defeat different enemies to solve each stage.

name: Mini Golf & Pool Bundle
Mint Works
summary: Mint Works is a 20 minute light worker placement game, great for new and experienced players alike. Use your workers to build plans, gain extra abilities and accrue victory points faster than your opponents!

name: Minecraft: Festive Mash-up
summary: Wander through a winter wonderland! World, textures, skins, and more!

name: Minima
summary: This minimalistic platformer is all about simplicity and chill vibes. Sit back, relax, and hop your way through 25 unique worlds... or race your friends to the top of the leaderboards!

name: Mission of Hero
summary: You are a soldier in an elite, special squad that was sent to carry out a secret operation to steal information from the terrorists' base.

name: Missing on Lost Island
summary: Czech adventure classic.

name: miCoach by adidas
summary: miCoach by adidas features over 400 workouts with top-tier athletes including Dwight Howard, Kaka, and Jessica Ennis.

name: Midnight Cipher
summary: Welcome to Sol Tollere, a city rebuilding from the EMP detonation disaster, which crippled industrial technology everywhere. Communication between people is being controlled by mega-corporations, acting as the digital postal service. Apply today to earn a living delivering these precious messages!

name: Mind-Roll
summary: Mind-Roll by Thalamus (published by Epyx in the US) is a fun Marble Madness-style game with a simple premise: guide the marble through a complex obstacle course to the exit, avoiding obstacles on the way.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Grumman Gulfhawk II
summary: In the 1930s the Grumman Aircraft Company was looking for ways to promote its new line of fast biplane fighter-bombers, so in 1936 an F3F-1 was equipped with a 1,000-horsepower Wright Cyclone engine and specially modified for high-stress manoeuvring and aerobatics.

name: Mizuki Shigeru no Yokai Butou-den
summary:
Mizuki Shigeru no Youkai Butouden is a horror-themed fighting game based on the works of renowed japanese artist Mizuki Shigeru (1922 - 2015).
This game was released for the original Sony Playstation by KSS in 1997.
It features 8 playable characters based on demons of japanese folklore known as Yokai.

name: Mikoshi
summary: Twelve levels of dynamic platforming with interesting story, charismatic main character and his friends, ability improvements, epic boss battles, secrets hidden throughout and high quality graphics.

name: Mini Golf
summary: A mini golf game with a pseudo-3D perspective.

name: Midtown Crazy Race
summary: This game is a tribute to the car games from late 90s, a madness race in Midtown.

name: Midnightland
summary: Explore, shoot, collect and kill in Midnightland a retro style B-movie horror amusement park that is constantly evolving.

name: Mini Game Player
summary: The Mini Game Player is an LCD game collection that includes various clone puzzle games, including clones of Tetris and Breakout.

name: Midnight Star: Renegade
summary: Midnight Star: Renegade is a mobile shooter from IndustrialToys.

name: Misplaced
summary: Misplaced is an action platformer released by Harambert on itch.

name: Mission: Afghanistan
summary: A run n' gun arcade shooter inspired by games such as Metal Slug 3 and Contra 3.

name: Mibt
summary: Help the government agents in black thong to end the alien threat and the invasion of the machines. 1 or 2 players. Individual and cooperative. Gamepad compatible. Demo available.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Definitive Edition
summary: In this bundle, in addition to the main game, you will get access to a new Spring and Winter Islands.

name: Misaligned
summary: Classic 80s inspired shooter

name: Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series
summary: A cancelled port of Microsoft Combat Flight Simulator: WWII Europe Series for the Sega Dreamcast.

name: Mining Copper
summary: Place the copper smelting game, buy upgraded equipment to smelt copper plates

name: Micro Olympics on Mars
summary:
Will you be the champion of Micro-Olympics on Mars?
Shoot your flying saucer as far as you can.
Buy and carefully use power-ups on your way to the top.
Try to beat all 7 glorious pilots in this fast paced game…

name: Minton Keibu no Sousa File Doukeshi Satsujin Jiken
summary: A summer resort town Brighton stands not far from London, with a small circus troupe becomes the main attraction of the season. Just a day before the premiere clown Charles Dubois is found dead in a shower wagon, the cause of death is a knife strike from the back. Star as the detective who is called from London to resolve this case.

name: Midnight Blues
summary: Smash, slash, and shoot your way to freedom through the bloody criminal underworld of a dark, future New York. Midnight Blues features fast-paced, unforgiving combat that will tug at your nerves until every man but you is dead.

name: Mithrall
summary: Welcome to Mithrall, an immersive large Scale Survival experience with sandbox survival elements and innovative server meshing. Build, battle, and explore in a vast, dynamic world against thousands. Forge your path to glory in a realm where every action shapes the adventure.

name: Minecraft: Halloween Mash-up
summary: Dress suitably spookily and prepare for the ultimate Minecraft Halloween thrill ride!

name: Mind of the Midwest
summary: Killing cults in the Midwest.

name: Mini Speedy Racers
summary:
Join the Mini Speedy Racers league and compete against crazy mini mad drivers in this extremely fun and entertaining racing game.

Pick your racer, select your track, and speed up! You can bump against other mini speedy racers, pick up tricks to make fun of them, pick up turbos to speed up, and just make sure to cross the finish line ahead of all them to celebrate.

The game includes many good-looking retro style racers, challenging tracks, several nice cartoonish environments, and many tricks.

name: Mine Memory
summary: Uncover the skeletons in Hana's closet in "Mine Memory," a gripping psychological visual novel. Dive into Hana's memories, shape her destiny, and confront haunting choices with deep consequences.

name: Military Division
summary: MilitaryDivision is a 2D side-scrolling platform shooter. A large terrorist group has taken over the area of the city. You are the last remaining of your detachment, the liberators. Destroy the enemies and make it out of the area alive.

name: Mission Cobra
summary: Searing gunfire inflicts heavy damage on both sides as you slice into a murderous squadron of enemy fighter jets. As the commander of a fast and powerful helicopter, you must face an intense struggle against a pair of patrolling choppers before you are allowed to turbo-boost through enemy defenses to reach the motherships. Only with fast reaction and uncanny accuracy can you defeat the motherships which launch a seemingly endless arsenal of weapons.

name: Microcosmum: Survival of Cells - Campaign Static
summary: We are glad to present you with a new additional campaign consisting of 50 missions. In this campaign, all the organisms are static, which can help you to experience the gameplay in another way and apply new tactics. In the course of playing your organisms will get three skills.

name: Miracle! Panzou: 7-tsu no Hoshi no Uchuu Kaizoku
summary: Miracle! Panzou: 7-tsu no Hoshi no Uchuu Kaizoku is an Action game, developed and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Micro Machines Military
summary: Micro Machines Military is a driving game, developed by Supersonic Software and published by Codemasters, which was released in Europe in 1996.

name: Midnight on the Milky Way
summary: In the depths of space, without a memory or face, you find yourself aboard a train of mystery and stars. The passengers abroad—some dangerous, some odd—offer you no answers as you search throughout the cars. The clock is slowly ticking. Your stop is coming into sight. Will you find what you are looking for on this lonely, starry night?

name: Mixed Messages
summary: Alternate typing and drawing with peeps either online or in person. Two to twenty-one players required.

name: Misión en África
summary:
Mission in Africa was a Spanish educational interactive adventure that in order to advance you will have to answer basic Spanish language questions such as accents, punctuation marks and others.
The story is about a secret agent called Zeta who will have to go to Africa to find out why so many trees and crops are drying up in an area where there were no earthquakes before.

name: Michigan: Report from Hell
summary: Michigan: Report from Hell, released as Michigan in Japan, is a survival horror game developed by Grasshopper Manufacture and published by Spike. It was released in Japan on August 5, 2004, in Europe on September 30, 2005, and in Australia in 2005. This game was never released in North America. Directed by Akira Ueda and planned by Goichi Suda, the game focuses on a news crew for the fictional ZaKa TV, dedicated to covering strange phenomena. The game is unique in the sense that it is played almost entirely though the viewfinder of a camera; and the game is lost if the player runs out of film before solving the mysteries in a mission.

name: Midwest 90: Rapid City
summary: Midwest 90: Rapid City is a single player, narrative focused survival- tycoon PC game, where the player Builds and Protects their restaurant that serves Monster Meat Dishes.

name: Mint Muse Sound Flare
summary: Sound Flare is a new digital audio workstation (DAW) built from the ground up for mixing 3D spatial audio in VR. Its intuitive design enables fast audio production in VR and efficient production schedules for both 3D audio and 3D video projects.

name: Millennium Secrets: Roxanne’s Necklace
summary: A terrifying explosion has destroyed a secret bunker and you have been called in to investigate! Capture the culprit before it’s too late in Millennium Secrets: Roxanne’s Necklace! Help solve an ancient mystery and stop the evildoer from striking again!

name: Mirrors
summary: An atmospheric adventure game following the story of the lead singer for a band named Elleno Vision.

name: Mighty Chameleon Brothers
summary: Mighty Chameleon Brothers will remind you of old-school arcade classics, with bright and colorful visuals and fun cartoon characters! You'll love the simple yet addictive game play!

name: Mirror Movement
summary: This is a turn-based, medieval-style board game. In it you must move the mirrors to direct the laser at the target location... Take the opportunity to add me to your wish list and follow me!

name: Mini Words
summary: 721 words. That is enough to cover 90% of conversations in English. Unscramble those words in Mini Words - a unique mix of puzzle, word search and hangman.

name: Military History Commander: Europe at War
summary: Commander: Europe at War is a turn based strategy game taking place during World War II. The player can opt to play as the allies or axis forces in a game that spans the entire European chapter of the war. Or play one of the 6 included scenarios such as Operation Barbarossa, D Day or the Grand Campaign.

name: MicroCrawl
summary: Microcrawl is a bite sized point and click 2D adventure text hybrid presented from the first person in which you'll have to navigate your way back through a dark fantasy world to get back home.

name: Midnight Race Club: Supercharged!
summary:
Midnight Race Club: Supercharged! is the second racing game from the developers behind the notorious Big Rigs: Over the Road Racing. Unlike Big Rigs, it has proper collision detection, unintentionally removing one of the quirks that made the previous game famous.

Midnight Race Club was originally intended to be a single package along with Big Rigs, but GameMill decided to split the two early in development. For this reason, both games share an identical UI and near-identical gameplay.

name: Migrate
summary: A roguelike platformer dedicated to the quirkiness of birds. Hop south to recover the wisdom of an ancient bird society, in hopes of building a better world for all birdkind. Randomized levels keep the game fresh and challenging.

name: Military Tanks
summary: Do you like tanks game? Are you ready to feel the full power of a tank games?

name: Miss Right?
summary: This is A story about Miss Right. "TIangou" is a Chinese internet word. Means A man, who love a Girl, Give everything to the Gril,but GIrl do not accept him. Just like Miss Right, but your Miss right do not think you are Mr Right.

name: Minimum Wage: Influence the Election
summary: Nail biting mischief. Manipulate the powerful with every decision you make.

name: Midline '85
summary: Midline ‘85 is an interactive psychological thriller about working as an emergency call-taker in the murky past of 1985. Protect your hometown of Midline from death and destruction, and protect your protagonist from succumbing to the stress of her job…

name: M.I.A.: Mission in Asia
summary: M.I.A.: Mission in Asia is a first-person shooter video game. The game is set during the war in South Ossetia during the summer of 2008, from a Russian perspective.

name: MiniState
summary: Wage war, trade, and build alliances to build the greatest nation the world will ever know.

name: MineColony
summary: It’s a sandbox game similar to Minecraft and Terraria but with economy twist. In the beginning you collect resources to build your little settlement. You can mine ore, coal, smelt iron and craft tools. It features 8-bit, retro style graphics and soothing background music.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Diamond DA40
summary: This single engine aircraft brings a new level of sophistication to general aviation, boasting a glass panel instrument system with built-in autopilot, enhanced frame rates, and fully functional gauges.

name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Cargo Crew
